pa de ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos thams cad la 'dod chags par mi byed/ zhe sdang bar mi byed/ gti mug par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rjes su

mi mthong zhing / chos de mi dmigs te/ gang 'dod chags pa dang gang la 'dod chags pa dang gang gis 'dod chags pa dang gang zhe sdang ba dang gang la zhe sdang ba dang gang gis zhe sdang ba dang gang gti mug pa dang gang la gti mug pa dang gang
gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs so/ /chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing ma dmigs na khams gsum thams cad la ma chags par 'gyur te myur

du ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa ste/ /thams cad
mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med/ /skyes pa med cing 'gags pa med par yang / /de ltar chos rnams shin du rig par gyis/ /thams cad dngos po med cing yi ge med/ /stong pa zhi ba gzod nas dri
ma med/ /de ltar chos rnams gang gis shes pa ni/ /gzhon nu de ni sangs rgyas zhes kyang brjod/ /de phyir rang bzhin mnyam nyid rnams spros pa/ /ngo bo nyid kyis chos kun rang bzhin med/ /bde bar
gshegs pa'i yum 'di su 'dod pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi yum 'di 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal
pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ gzhal du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /gzhon nu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya zhe na/ gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa de

skyes ma thag tu sting gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam du 'phags nas gom pa bdun bor te tshig 'di skad gsung ngo / /chos thams cad dngos po med pa las byung ba'o/ /chos thams cad dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes

gsungs te/ gzhon nu sgra de'i dbyangs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams go bar byas so/ /de nas sa'i lha nas bzung ste tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra bsgrags shing dbyangs kyis rjes

su go bar byas te/ e ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skyes ma thag tu steng gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas gom pa bdun bor te/ dngos po med pa'i sgra 'byin pa las na dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes

bya bar 'gyur ro zhes mtshan dngos po med pa las byung ba/ dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes btags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de byang chub thob pa na shing thams cad kyi lo ma dang rtsa ba dang shing gel pa dang nags tshal

thams cad dang ri'i rtse mo thams cad las kyang dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes sgra byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de na sgrar btags pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad las dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes rnam par rig

par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo / /gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba de'i gsung rab la rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen

po sems shes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa zhig byung ngo / /gzhon nu de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung bas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad do/ /

de ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rab tu dad de/ sems rab tu dad pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bzung ste/ bzung zhing bcangs

blags kun chub par byas nas sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur nam yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma song ngo / /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi

shu mnyes par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan to/ /sangs rgyas de dag thams cad las mnyan nas kyang bzung ngo kun chub par byas so/ /bcangs so/ /blags so/ /bton to/ /

nyon mongs pa med par bsgoms shing mang du byas te/ bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas so/ /de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa nyi shu 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas don legs par bsams pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ des sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byas/ sems can tshad med pa'i don byas nas de'i 'og tu shing zad pa'i me ltar

yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /gzhon nu de lta bas na rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces spras byed pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pa yongs

su rdzogs par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di nyid rgyas par tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /

sngon 'das dus kyi bskal pa bsam yas na/ /mi yi gtso bo byung ba ngas dran te/ /drang srong chen po gzengs kyis don mdzad pa/ /de ming dngos po med las byung zhes bya/ /skyes ma thag tu mkha' la rab 'dug nas/ /chos rnams

thams cad dngos po med par bstan/ /de tshe de dang 'thun par mtshan btags te/ /sgras ni 'jig rten kun du grags par byas/ /lha rnams thams cad rab tu sgra 'byin pa/ /dngos po med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /skyes ma

thag tu gom pa bdun bor te/ /rgyal bas chos rnams dngos po med par bshad/ /thub pa chos rnams thams cad ston pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal por nam 'gyur tshe/ /rtsi shing gel ba ri dang brag rnams las/ /chos rnams

dngos po med ces sgra yang byung / /'jig rten de na ji snyed sgra yod pa/ /thams cad dngos med ci'ang med pa zhes/ /de lta bur ni 'jig rten 'dren pa yi/ /sgra dbyangs rnam pa shin du byung bar gyur/ /de yi dus na rgyal po'i bu skyes pa/ /ming ni

rtag tu snying rje sems shes bya/ /shin du gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa zhig /rgyal ba de yi drung du nyer 'ongs te/ /thub pa khyu mchog zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /ri mor bcas pas bskor bar byas nas ni/ /rdul bral bla

na med pa'i chos mnyan phyir/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis der 'dug go/ /rgyal ba dpa' bo des ni bsam mkhyen nas/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu bshad pa mdzad/ /des ni rdul bral ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/ /rgyal mchog bstan

la myur bar rab tu byung / /rab tu de byung ting 'dzin 'di yang ni/ /bzung zhing blags te yongs su chub byas pas/ /bskal pa bye ba nyi shu tshang bar ni/ /log par ltung ba'i sar yang yong ma song / /de ni dge bar byas pa'i las de yis/ /

sangs rgyas bye phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas/ /rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du yang / /ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni goms par byas/ /de phyis 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas gyur/ /ming ni don legs bsams shes rtag tu

brjod/ /sems can bye ba mang po'i don byas nas/ /phyi ma'i dus la me bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /dngos po med pa las byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po gsum pa/

de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji ltar na bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu gdon

par bya/ lung nod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par

spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed pa ste/ 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad byung ngo / /gzhon

nu de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gzung bar bya'o/ /de la

'di skad ces bya ste/ de phyir byang chub tu ni 'tshang rgya zhing / /srid pa'i mtsho las sems can sgrol 'dod pas/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mdo sde 'di zung shig /byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/ /de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon

par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o/ /chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang brag cha lta bu dang mig yor lta bu dang chu zla lta bu dang sprul pa lta bu dang gzugs brnyan lta bu dang nam

mkha' lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o/ /gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nam chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes shing / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang brag cha lta bu dang mig

yor lta bu dang chu zla lta bu dang sprul pa lta bu dang gzugs brnyan lta bu dang nam mkha' lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di chos zab mo bzod pa la

mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /chos zab mo bzod pa dang ldan pa de 'dod chags par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi chags/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i chos la mi sdang / gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi rmongs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos de mi dmigs te/ gang 'dod chags pa dang gang la 'dod chags pa dang gang gis 'dod chags pa dang gang zhe sdang ba dang gang la zhe sdang ba dang gang gis zhe sdang ba dang gang gti mug pa

dang gang la gti mug pa dang gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos de mi dmigs so/ /chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs pas 'dod chags pa med pa/ zhe sdang ba med pa/

gti mug pa med pa/ sems phyin ci ma log pa/ mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /spros pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /rgal ba pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /skam la phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /bde bar son pa zhes bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa

thob pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims can zhes bya'o/ /ye shes can zhes bya'o/ /shes rab can zhes bya'o/ /bsod nams can zhes bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul can zhes bya'o/ /dran pa can zhes bya'o/ /blo gros can zhes bya'o/ /rtogs pa can zhes bya'o/ /

ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /brtan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'ang med

pa zhes bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/ /zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/

bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa 'khor bur ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang

thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /bram ze zhes bya'o/ /khrus byas pa zhes bya'o/ /pha rol du song ba zhes bya'o/ /rig par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /gtsang sbra can zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas

kyi sras shes bya'o/ /shAkya'i sras shes bya'o/ /tsher ma dkrugs pa zhes bya'o/ /khrims ma dral ba zhes bya'o/ /'obs dral ba zhes bya'o/ /'obs las rgal ba ces bya'o/ /zug rngu phyung ba ces bya'o/ /nad med pa ces bya'o/ /

dge slong zhes bya'o/ /kun nas dkris pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu dam pa zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu mchog ces bya'o/ /skyes bu chen po zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu seng ge zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu glang po che

zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu cang shes pa zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu lcid khyer ba ces bya'o/ /skyes bu dpa' bo ces bya'o/ /skyes bu rtsal po che zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu me tog ces bya'o/ /skyes bu pad ma zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu pad ma

dkar po zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu 'dul ba zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu zla ba zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu phal pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /mi gos pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos zab mo'i bzod pa la 'jug pa'i chos

kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /nam zhig 'jig rten khams 'di 'byung ba dang / /'jig rten thams cad nam mkhar gyur pa'i tshe/ /ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin te/ /chos

rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /'jig rten 'di na ji snyed ci yod pa/ /chu yi phung po 'di ni 'og tu 'gro/ /'og tu ci 'dur sting du'ang de bzhin te/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar bar snang

chung zad sprin med las/ /skad cig tu ni sprin gyi dkyil 'khor snang / /thog ma ga las byung bar shes par bya/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad shes par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das pa dag /ji ltar yid

la byas bzhin gzugs brnyan snang / /sngon mtha' ji bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin te/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar dbu ba mang po rdos pa dag /chu bos khyer ba skyes bus nges mthong ste/ /

de la brtags na snying po yong mi snang / /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar char pa'i thigs chen bab pa na/ /chu'i chu bur dag ni tha dad 'byung / /byung nas zhig ste chu yi chu bur med/ /chos rnams

thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar spring yig grong gzhan bskur ba las/ /dge dang mi dge'i bya ba so sor 'byung / /sgra las spring yig tu yang 'phos pa med/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /

ji ltar mi dag chang gis myos nas ni/ /sa 'di kun tu 'khor snyam byed mod kyi/ /sa 'di 'gul zhing g.yos pa'ang med pa ltar/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /me long ngos dang 'bru mar snod rnams

la/ /bud med kha bzhin rgyan pas bltas pa na/ /byis pa de ni de la chags bskyed nas/ /'dod pa tshol ba'i phyir yang shin du rgyug /bzhin ni der yang 'phos pa ma yin te/ /gzugs brnyan la ni nam yang bzhin
mi rnyed/ /rmongs pa de dag 'dod chags skyes pa ltar/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang / /sgyu ma ji bzhin rmi lam ji lta bur/ /mtshan ma

sgom pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar nam mkha' dang bar zla shar ba/ /de yi gzugs brnyan dang ba'i mtshor snang ste/ /zla ba chu yi nang du 'phos pa med/ /chos kun mtshan

nyid de 'drar shes par gyis/ /ji ltar mi dag nags ri'i khrod 'dug nas/ /glu len smra dang rgod dang ngu ba las/ /brag cha thos kyang snang ba med pa ltar/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /glu dang

rol mo de bzhin ngu ba yang / /de la brten nas brag cha 'byung mod kyi/ /sgra la dbyangs de nam yang yod ma yin/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod bsten pa/ /skyes

bu sad par gyur nas mi mthong ste/ /byis pa shin du 'dod la chags shing zhen/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /sgyu ma byed pa dag gis gzugs sprul te/ /rta dang glang po shing rta sna tshogs

byas/ /de la ji ltar snang ba gang yang med/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu'i rmi lam na/ /bu pho byung zhing shi ba des mthong nas/ /byung nas dga' zhing shi nas mi dga' ltar/ /chos

rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar mtshan mo chu yi zla ba dag /dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i chu nang snang / /chu zla stong pa gsog ste gzung du med/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar

sos ka'i nyi ma phyed dus na/ /skyes bu skom pas gdungs shing 'gro ba yis/ /smig rgyu dag la chu yi phung por mthong / /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /smig rgyu la yang chu ni yong med na/ /sems can

rmongs pa de la 'thung 'dod de/ /mi bden chu ni 'thung bar yong mi nus/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /ji ltar chu shing rlon pa'i sdong po la/ /snying po 'dod phyir skyes bus de gshegs kyang / /nang dang phyi rol kun na

snying po med/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /mig dang rna ba sna yang tshad ma min/ /lce dang lus dang sems kyang tshad ma min/ /dbang po 'di dag gal te tshad yin na/ /'phags pa'i lam gyis su la ci zhig

bya/ /'di ltar dbang po 'di dag tshad min zhing / /ngo bo nyid kyis bems po lung ma bstan/ /de phyir mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam 'dod pa/ /des ni 'phags pa'i lam gyis bya ba byos/ /lus la sngon gyi mtha' ma rab brtags na/ /

de la lus med lus su 'du shes med/ /gang la lus med lus su shes med pa/ /de ni 'dus ma byas kyi rigs shes bya/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i chos la chos med de/ /gang phyir 'di med nam yang yod mi 'gyur/ /rtog can dag gi

yod dang med ces bya/ /de ltar spyod pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur/ /yod dang med ces bya ba gnyi ga mtha'/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang mtha' yin te/ /de phyir gnyis ka'i mtha' ni rnam spangs nas/ /mkhas pa dbus la'ang gnas

par yong mi byed/ /yod dang med ces bya ba rtsod pa ste/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang rtsod pa yin/ /rtsod par gyur pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur/ /rtsod pa med par gyur pa sdug bsngal 'gag / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam byas te/
byis pa bdag nyid lus la mngon sum snyems/ /lus la mngon sum gyur pa rlom sems med/ /de ni rlom sems med do thams cad spangs/ /bsam gtan bzhi dag gi yang gtam byas nas/ /byis pa bdag nyid bsam gtan

spyod yul smra/ /bsam gtan nyon mongs med cing rlom sems med/ /shes pas rtogs nas dregs pa rab tu spongs/ /bden pa bzhi yi gtam rnams byas nas kyang / /byis pa bdag nyid bden pa mthong zhes zer/ /bden pa

mthong la rlom sems gang yang med/ /rlom sems med pa bden pa rgyal bas gsungs/ /tshul khrims srung zhing de yis snyems mi bya/ /chos rnams mnyan cing des ni mi snyems te/ /gang dag shes rab chung ngu de snyems pa/

rtsa ba de las de yi sdug bsngal 'phel/ /'jig rten 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis/ /dregs pa sdug bsngal rtsa ba yin par bstan/ /rgyags pas dregs pa sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel/ /rlom sems med pa sdug bsngal

'gag par 'gyur/ /ji snyed chos mang yongs su chub byas nas/ /thos pas rgyags shing tshul khrims mi srung na/ /tshul khrims 'chal bas ngan 'gror de 'gro la/ /thos pa mang pos de la skyob mi nus/ /gal te tshul khrims

grags pas de rgyags shing / /mang du thos la brtson par mi byed na/ /tshul khrims 'bras bu ma lus zad nas ni/ /phyir yang sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na ting 'dzin sgom byed kyang / /de ni bdag

tu 'du shes gzhig mi byed/ /de yi nyon mongs phyir yang rab tu ldang / /lhag spyod kyis ni ting 'dzin 'dir bsgoms bzhin/ /gal te bdag med chos la rab rtog cing / /de dag brtags nas gal te sgom byed na/ /'bras bu

mya ngan 'das thob rgyu de yin/ /rgyu gzhan de dag zhi bar 'gyur mi srid/ /mi zhig chom rkun mang pos rab gtses nas/ /'tsho bar 'dod pas bros shing 'gror brtsal na/ /de yi rkang pa 'gro zhing rgyug ma nus/ /chom rkun dag gis

de bzung bcom pa ltar/ /de bzhin tshul khrims nyams pa rmongs pa'i mi/ /'dus byas dag las 'bros par 'dod mod kyi/ /tshul khrims nyams pas de yang 'bros mi nus/ /na rga 'chi ba dag gis shin du bcom/ /ji

ltar mi rgod stong phrag mang po dag / /rnam pa du ma'i sgo nas sdigs pa byed/ /de bzhin nyon mongs sgo rnams du ma nas/ /mi rgod bzhin du dge ba'i phyogs rnams 'joms/ /gang gis phung po bdag med rab brtags te/ /

spyos shing brgyad kyang zhum par mi 'gyur ba/ /nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang du de mi 'gro/ /stong pa shes pa de la 'khrug pa med/ /'gro mang phung po stong par ston mod kyi/ /ji ltar bdag med de dag mi shes te/ /mi shes de dag gzhan gyis

brgal na yang / /khro ba'i zil gyis non cing tshig rtsub smra/ /mi dag na zhing lus ni sdug bsngal te/ /lo grangs mang por res 'ga' ma thar ba/ /de ni yun ring nad kyis nyon mongs pas/ /nad rnams gso ba'i phyir yang sman pa

btsal/ /yang dang yang ni de yis btsal ba dang / /sman pa mkhas shing rig pa des rnyed de/ /des kyang snying rje nye bar bzhag nas ni/ /sman 'di gtang bar gyis shis smras pa dang / /sman mang bzang zhing phangs pa des blangs nas/ /

na ba 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i sman mi 'thung / /sman pas ma lan sman gyis ma nyes te/ /nad pa de nyid kyis ni nyes pa yin/ /de bzhin bstan pa 'di la rab byung ste/ /stobs dang bsam gtan dbang po kun rig nas/ /sgom pa la ni mngon

par brtson mi byed/ /rigs par mi brtson ga la mya ngan 'da'/ /rtag tu chos kun rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jig /srid pa thams cad yong ye stong pa ste/ /nyi tshe'i stong pa mu stegs

can dag gi/ /mkhas pa byis pa dag dang rtsod mi byed/ /byis pa dag ni ri mor byas nas spongs/ /zhe sdang sems kyis bdag gi drung 'ong zhes/ /byis pa'i chos la sten par yang mi byed/ /byis pa dag gi rang bzhin rgyud rig

nas/ /mkhas pa byis pa dag dang mi 'grogs te/ /ji srid du ni byis pa legs bsnyen kyang / /de dag phyir yang dgra dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa byis pa dag la yid mi rton/ /mkhas dang byis pa'i rang bzhin chos nyid ni/ /

byis pa'i rang bzhin ngang tshul tha dad de/ /so so'i skye bo la ni mdza' ba med/ /chos dang ldan pa'i tshig tu smras na yang / /yid mi ches dang zhe sdang khro ba dag /mngon par ston pa 'di ni byis pa'i chos/ /don 'di rnam par rig pas

yid mi rton/ /byis pa dang ni byis par 'thun 'byor ba/ /ji ltar mi gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bzhin/ /mkhas pa dag ni mkhas pa'i skye bo dang / /'thun zhing 'byor pa mar dang snying ku bzhin/ /'khor ba'i nyes la so sor

ma brtags te/ /las kyi rnam par smin la mi 'jug cing / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshig la ma dad pas/ /byis pa de dag bcad cing gtub par 'gyur/ /mi 'thob rab tu rnyed dka' thob nas ni/ /bzo yi gnas dag la ni mkhas

ma gyur/ /dbul por gyur cing nor yang yong med de/ /de nas 'tsho ba med pas rab tu 'byung / /sangs rgyas bstan 'dir de dag rab byung nas/ /lhung bzed chos gos dag la chags par 'gyur/ /de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos

yongs zin pas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bslab pa mi spyod de/ /de dag bdag gi tshul khrims ma mthong bas/ /byis pa dag ni sems gnas mi rnyed cing / /nyin mtshan rnal 'byor la yang mi brtson pas/ /de dag sdig pa'i

lam la smod mi byed/ /lus dang sems ni shin du mi sdom pa/ /de ni tshig tu mi smra ci 'ang med/ /su yis nyes pa ci byas brgal lo zhes/ /rtag tu gzhan gyi nyes pa tshol zhing rtog /byis pa dag ni zas la chags

gyur nas/ /zas la tshod rig par ni mi byed de/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams kyis ni zas rnyed kyang / /de la byis pa byas pa gzo mi 'gyur/ /de dag kha zas ro zhim bsod pa dag /rnyed nas rnal 'byor mi brtson za

zhing 'thung / /de dag la ni zas de gdug par 'gyur/ /bal glang phru gus rtsa ba ma bkrus bzhin/ /mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa ni/ /kha zas bzang po gtsang ma za mod kyi/ /de dag la ni chags par mi 'gyur te/ /

ma chags bzhin du za zhing rnal 'byor brtson/ /mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa dag /byis pa gang nas legs par 'ongs shes smra/ /de bzhin snyan pa'i tshig gis nyer bsdus nas/ /de dag la ni snying rje nye bar

'jog /byis pa la ni gang phan snying brtse ba/ /de la gnod pa byung na byis pa dga'/ /de lta'i nyes phyir byis pa rnam spangs te/ /ri dgas bzhin du gcig pu dgon par gnas/ /mkhas pas 'di 'dra'i nyes pa rig nas ni/ /shes

rab dman bsten bdag ni mtho ris nyams/ /byang chub thob par ga la 'gyur snyam ste/ /byis pa rnams dang nam yang yong mi sten/ /byams pa la ni mkhas pa gnas par 'gyur/ /snying rje dag la gnas shing dga' spyod dang / /

srid pa kun la rtag tu btang snyoms pa/ /ting nge 'dzin bsgoms byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /mya ngan med zhi byang chub des rtogs shing / /sems can na rgas gzir bar rig nas ni/ /de la snying rje rab tu nyer bzhag ste/ /don dam

ldan pa'i gtam rnams ston par byed/ /rgyal ba'i chos nyid brjod du med pa dang / /bde bar gshegs pa'i bden pa sus shes pa/ /de dag 'di lta bu yi chos thos nas/ /'phags pa zang zing med pa'i bzod pa 'thob/ /chos zab mo la

bzod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na nan tan snying por bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan snying por byed pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par dka' ba ma yin na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos/ de nas zla 'od gzhon nur
gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa 'di legs par bstan cing legs par bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab

pa thams cad bstan te/ legs par bshad pa dang legs par bkod pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'ang

ma lags na mu stegs can gzhan gyi lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang nan tan snying por bgyis te lus dang srog la yang mi lta bar bgyis la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob bo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das

bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdud sdig
can shin du gzhig par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa bdag
gi spyi bo la gzhag par gsol/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam mkha' 'dra zhing rdul bral gzugs bzang 'chang / /shes rab sras po lus dang mtshan mi mnga'/ /yon tan rgya mtsho rab zab thugs rje can/ /

mtshungs med phyag ni bdag gi spyi bor zhog /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las byung ba/ mtshan sna tshogs kyis shin du brgyan pa/ lha'i gser gyi kha dog lta

bu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor bzhag go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pa bzhag ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha'

mdzod dang rdo rje lta bu dang yid ltar mgyogs pa dang gzugs thams cad ston pa dang sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ston pa dang stong pa nyid thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag mngon du gyur to/ /gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo du ma mngon du gyur to/ /dga' ba dang bde ba gang de 'phags

pas brjod pa/ lha yul ba rgya che zhing dpe med pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul du rig pa rab tu thob bo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dra bas mdzes 'brel bum pa lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' zhing / /

dpal be'u 'khor lo rgyal mtshan ba dan nya ris mnga'/ /bskal pa bye mang rin chen gtong la zhugs pa'i phyag /bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nu'i spyi bor bzhag /de nas lha yul pa rgya che zhing dpe med pa/ sangs rgyas

dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul du rig pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba dang ldan par gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /bla med mi 'jigs sbyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan phan

sems can gnyen rtsa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs bcu bden pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs mi mnyam mnyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po shin du thugs rje can la phyag

'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo dgra bzhi rnam par btul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtson pa dam pa'i don rnams mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi sku mchog mnga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje byams 'od rgyal ba'i

nyi ma mun sel ba/ /shes rab shin du yangs pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil du shar/ /don dam shin du zab pa'i chos rnams ston mdzad pa/ /lha khyod la ni rtag tu bdag kyang skyabs su mchi/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur
gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du byang chub sems

dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sang bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol bar thugs la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag gi sdum par gtsang ma'i bshos gsol bar/ /mi dbang

sras dang bcas la gsol ba 'debs/ /thub pa'i dbang po bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /mgon po lha yi gtso bos gnang bar mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la thugs brtse

ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du sang bshos gsol bar cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas

bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas

nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar du de'i bar gyi lam thams cad

legs par brgyan te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lam yangs shing che la rtswa dang sdong du dang tsher ma dang rdo dang gyo mo dang gseg ma med par bsal te bye ma gtsang mas bdal nas/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar

'jam zhing reg na bde ba/ dbyangs dga' bar byas te/ lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang dri mchog dang a ti mug ta ka dang ma li ka dang tsam pa ka dang skya nar dang kun da dang ti la ka dang ke sa ra

dang mya ngan 'tshang la sogs pa dus thams cad kyi me tog bzang pos ni kun du khebs par byas/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang rin po che'i rta babs dang bla re ni bres/ rin po che'i bdug spos kyi

snod sna tshogs ni ngos la spyangs/ rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod de dag thams cad nas ni a ga ru nag pos gang ba'i du ba 'thul/ phyogs phyogs su ni bro mkhan dang gar mkhan lha'i glu gar dang rol mo shin du 'byor cing legs

par bslabs pa rnams bkod/ skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo shin du brgyan pa khar rnga dang tu Na ba dang pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang pi bang dang gling bu dang rdza rnga dang rnga mu kun da dang rdza rnga chen po thogs pa rnams bkod/ lam gyi ngos gnyis

su shing rta la mthon po lha'i rin po che sna tshogs dang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres shing sgra 'khrol bas brgyan pa rnams dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi mkha' rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang / rin po che

sna bdun gyi shing sna tshogs khrun dang sboms su ldan pa sna tshogs dang dus thams cad kyi lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dag btsugs so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lam ni sna tshogs shin du legs par brgyan/ /

bla res dang ni gdugs dang ba dan sgreng / /sil snyan dag gi sgra dag rab tu 'byin/ /glu sgra yid du 'ong ba'ang de bzhin te/ /bud med mang po bro rdung gar byed dang / /gos bzang khrag khrig rnam mang sna tshogs dang / /me tog phreng ba bzang

zhing mdzes pa yis/ /lam mchog yangs pa de ni rab tu brgyan/ /grong mchog gtsang ma 'dir ni thugs rje can/ /sangs rgyas thub pa'i zla ba gshegs so zhes/ /zla 'od gzhon nus dad pa rab bskyed nas/ /rgya che yangs pa'i

lam ni shin du brgyan/ /lha rdzas kyi ni bye ma gtsang ma bdal/ /rab tu yid 'ong me tog mchog rnams bkram/ /rin chen rta babs dag kyang legs par btsugs/ /lam ni lha yi grong khyer bzhin du mdzes/ /zla 'od gzhon nu shin du yid

dga' bas/ /de ltar lam rnams sna tshogs legs brgyan te/ /lha dang lha min klu yis de mthong nas/ /ngo mtshar gyur cing a la la zhes smra/ /lam gyi g.yas g.yon 'dzam bu'i chu gser gyi/ /ta la mtho zhing bzang

la zlum pa dag /rin chen dril bu'i dra bas g.yogs shing dkris/ /sgra 'khrol rnam pa du ma mang po btsugs/ /de bzhin rin chen sdong po khrag khrig ni/ /dus kun gyi yang me tog rgyas pa btsugs/ /de yis yangs pa'i lam brgyan

mdzes gyur pa/ /mtho ris na ni dga' ba'i tshal bu bzhin/ /rin po che las byas pa'i mkha' rten ni/ /dra ba'i chun po 'od 'bar shin du mdzes/ /dpe med mthong zhing che la rgyas pa dag / /lam gyi g.yas g.yon 'gram du btsugs

shing bkod/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gsum dbang gang nas ni/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong du gshegs pa yi/ /lam chen de ni de dag rab brgyan pas/ /rnam pa thams cad du yang mdzes par gyur/ /g.yas g.yos su ni rin

chen pog phor spyangs/ /de dag a ga ru yang nag pos bkang / /pog phor kun nas du ba sprin bzhin 'khrigs/ /lha'i dri zhim rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung / /ji srid grong khyer chu dron sgo bar dang / /ri rgyal bya rgod phung po ji srid par/ /

zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal ba'i phyir/ /lha rdzas dpe med yangs pas brgyan pa byas/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas lam de rin po che bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan pa byas nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bya

rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po gang na ba dang rang gi lha'i khyim mtho zhing che la yangs pa gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas rang gi khyim du zhugs so/ /zhugs nas bza' ba dang bca' ba

dang myang ba mang zhing bzang ba g.yor bcug ste/ zhal zas ro sna brgya pa sbyar nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po chag chag legs par btab/ byi dor legs par byas nas me tog sil ma ni

bkram/ bdug spos kyis ni bdugs/ bla re ni bres/ dar gyi lda ldi dang chun po ni spyangs/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni bsgreng ste/ de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i lam srang dang grong bar du bcas pa rdo dang gyo mo dang

gseg ma med par byas/ me tog sna tshogs ni bkram/ tsan dan gyi phye mas ni gtor/ skar khung dang rta babs dang sgo gang dang ba gam dang skar khung dra ba ris dang zla ba kham pa lta bus ni brgyan cing tsan dan gyis byug pa byas te/ de ltar rgyal

po'i khabs kyi grong khyer chen po dpag tu med pa'i bkod pas rab tu brgyan nas/ rang gi khyim yang rgyan sna tshogs pa rnam pa du mas brgyan te/ rin po che'i phreng ba rnam pa du ma ni rab tu spyangs/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i gos kyis ni

brgyan cing nye 'khor yang mdzes par byas/ phreng ba dang lda ldi rnam pa tha dad pa du mas ni brgyan pa byed du bcug /rin po che'i stan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni 'ding du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de'i dbus

su bcom ldan 'das kyi lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i dang mi'i las 'das pa bshams so/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi pog phor ni phyogs bzhir spyangs te/ de dag nas a ga ru 'ba' zhig gi du ba 'thul bar byas so/ /zla 'od

gzhon nur gyur pas khyim mchog de yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir lha'i glu gar dang sil snyan ni bsgrags/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni bsgreng / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /

dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong gis ni gang zhing rnam par bltas/ rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs rnam pa du mas ni gang bar byas so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya

ste/ zla 'od kyis ni khyim mchog yangs pa yang / /rgya cher thams cad shin du brgyan par byas/ /gang la 'jig rten sgron ma bzhugs pa yi/ /lha rdzas seng ge'i khri ni dbus su btsugs/ /'jig rten sgron mdzad rgyal ba gtso

bo yi/ /dge 'dun dag ni gang la 'dug 'gyur ba/ /rin chen shin tu rnam par bkra ba'i stan/ /bye ba stong phrag mtha' yas legs par bting / /rin chen sna tshogs kun gyi bdug spos snod/ /a ga ru yis shin du

gang byas te/ /phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang rnam par spyangs/ /de dag nas ni yid 'ong dri rnams 'thul/ /zla 'od kyis ni stobs bcu gshegs pa'i phyir/ /rin chen me tog mdzes pa sna tshogs dang / /me tog dri mchog

bzang po rnam mang gis/ /khyim gyi sa gzhi bzang po kun du bkram/ /gar byed glu len sil snyan sgra dag gis/ /khyim mchog thams cad kun du sgra yis gang / /gdugs dang ba dan dag kyang shin du sgreng / /khyim kun lam

mer mdzes pa lha yi bzhin/ /zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim mchog chen po yang / /skyes bu na chung tshogs kyis rgyan gyur cing / /klu dang gnod sbyin lha min mang pos gang / /brgya phrag mang po'i lha yis rnam par bltas/ /de nas zla

'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po yang brgyan/ bdag gi khyim yang legs par brgyan nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang / nang par snga rab kyi dus kyi tshe sil snyan sna tshogs brgya dag ni rab tu dkrol/

gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bye ba du ma ni bsgreng ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu thams cad kyang lha'i me tog mAn+dA ras snyim pa bkang ste/ de dag las la la ni skye ba gcig gis thogs

pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mthu chen thob dang spos kyi glang po che dang rin po che'i tog dang mngon par 'byung dka' dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang dpa' bo'i

sde dang lag bzang dang rin chen me tog dang mthong ba don yod dang byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ rta dang ba lang du ma shin du brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid

pa mang po dang 'dres pa/ gzhan yang yul gyi mi dpag tu med pa'i tshogs dang bdag nyid kyang lha'i me tog mAn+dA ras snyim pa bkang ste byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub

sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i a la la zhes lha'i ga zha'i sgra yid du 'thad cing yid du 'ong ba yid 'phrog pa dag sgrog cing / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgo nas phyir byung ste/ ri'i

rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas lha'i me tog mAn+dA ra

bas snyim pa gang bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal

nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i snyim pa na me tog mAn+dA ra ba yod pa des bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gcig
tu 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas gdugs tshod la bab pa/ bcom ldan

'das bshos gtsang sbyar lags te/ da de'i dus la bab par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa dang dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa rgya che zhing rlabs che ba'i

lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang drang srong dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang grul bum dang yi dags dang srul po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dag dang yang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong

khyer chen por gshegs shing bdag gi sdum par yang gdugs tshod gsol ba'i dus la bab bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa gdugs tshod la bab po/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag gis grong khyer mchog kun legs par brgyan/ /

mgon po bdag gi sdum pa'ang de bzhin te/ /lha'i zhal zas ro brgya bshams shing sbyar/ /gdugs tshod bab kyis bde gshegs bzhengs su gsol/ /drang srong mchog gis phyag bgyis stobs bcu yon tan 'chang / /sras
kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing grong du gshegs/ /snang byed nyi ma mun pa'i tshogs sel bzhengs su gsol/ /bcom ldan bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol gdugs tshod bab/ /sras dang thabs gcig bdag gi sdum

par gshegs su gsol/ /'gro ba mang po'i tshogs kyi don kyang bgyis par 'gyur/ /ji ltar mar me mdzad kyis khyod la lung bstan pa/ /de bzhin bdag kyang 'jig rten mngon sum lung ston cig /bdag 'dir lung bstan 'jig

rten thos nas ni/ /sems kyang mchog tu rgya cher rab bskyed de/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'di na snod min sems can gang yang med/ /bzhengs shig bzhengs shig stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha/ /bdag

la rjes su phan mdzod sdum par gshegs/ /ji ltar bdag gi sdum par khyod gshegs pa/ /de bzhin byang chub shing dbang drung bdag mchi/ /byang chub shing dbang de drung bdag mchis nas/ /mi g.yo mi 'gul bar ni gnas

bcas te/ /byams pas sder bcas bdud rnams pham bgyis nas/ /khyod kyis brnyes bzhin byang chub thob par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa mkhyen nas/ zla 'od gzhon nur

gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pas slar bka' stsal pa/ longs shig zla 'od rgyal ba'i sras/ /longs shig sbyin dga' sems can mchog / /longs shig snying rje tshul khrims brtan/ /zan la deng ni khyim du 'dod/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs nas sngar gdan las bzhengs te/ sham thabs gsol/ chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po

dang thabs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin du mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang drang srong dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen

po dang grul bum dang yi dags dang srul po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong du mas mchod cing mngon par bstod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul

chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam gyis 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni rab tu gtong / sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu dkrol/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma

ni mngon par sgreng / gzugs dang kha dog rags pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngang ba dang khrung khrung dang ngur pa dang bzhad dang tsa ko ra dang rma bya dang tsa sha dang ri skegs dang khu byug dang ka la ping ka dang ku na la la sogs pa bya'i khyu mang po du ma

sgra snyan cing 'jam la yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma 'byin pas ni bar snang la lha bzhin du so so'i nga ros rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin/ lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyi snod yangs shing che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad

kyang bai dUr+ya dang an da rnyil dang shel dang spug gi yu ba can dag gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gzugs bzang dang dbang po'i tog dang rad rod can dang ba ku la dang lngas rtsen dang shAkya 'phel la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gi lag

pa gnyis na gtun 'dzin pa bzhin du thogs te/ spos sbrul gyi snying po dang go Shir Sha dang mri Na la dang ha ri dang ma la ya dang tsan dan dmar po dang a ga ru la sogs pas bkang ba'i du ba ni 'thul/ phyogs so so nas lhags pa'i rgyal po

dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa rnams rta dang ba lang rgyan gyis shin du brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa'i tshogs du ma dang shing rta dang dpung bu chung gis yongs su bskor cing phreng ba dang lda ldi mang po dang rin po che'i phreng ba lag na

thogs shing sngon logs nas rkang gis 'gro'o/ /rta dang glang po che legs par brgyan pa/ ma zhon par khrid pa dag kyang / rang gi stabs kyis mngon par 'gro zhing skad yid du 'ong la snyan pa 'byin to/ /tshangs pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi

g.yas phyogs nas mchod pa dang rim gro bsnyen bkur byed cing 'gro'o/ /g.yon phyogs nas ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rgya che zhing rlabs che ba/ bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams lha'i cod

pan bzang po dang gdu bu rgyan can dang rna cha dang gdu bu dang me tog rna rgyan dang rin po che'i tsong tsong dang me tog gi phreng bas lus brgyan cing / gzugs mngon par snang bas lha'i me tog mAn dA ra dang mdog mdzes dang ko bi dA ra dang s+thA la

ka dang ku ra ba ka dang tsam pa ka dang dong ka'i me tog dang mya ngan 'tshang dang skya snar dang a ti mug ta ka dang ut+pal dang ba ku la dang mal li ka dang kun da dang ke sa ra dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang dri mchog dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang

rin po che'i a ga ru dang shing rin po che'i 'bras bu can dag lag na thogs shing sil snyan sna tshogs brgya stong ni shin du dkrol/ gos bye ba ni g.yob cing a la la zhes ga zha'i sgra dag ni 'byin/ me tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'bebs

shing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i ngos thams cad bar mtshams med par gang bar 'khod de/ me tog dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das chu

dron yod pa'i sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gdugs tshod la gshegs so/ /de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bo yon tan kun gyi

rab brgyan pa/ /zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab snang mdzad cing / /bcom ldan mi yi seng ge gshegs par gyur/ /spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen don yod dang / /spos kyi bal glang rin chen lag bzung dang / /rin chen

tog dang 'byung dka' dpa' bo dang / /de dang gzhan dag rgyal ba'i zhabs 'bring byed/ /g.yas phyogs na ni mi pham 'dug gyur te/ /de ming byams pa yon tan mtha' yas phyug /bar du ma chod sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ /

bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyang rab tu rdzogs/ /byams dang btang snyoms dga' bas lus bsgoms shing / /chos kyi bdag nyid chen po snying rjes skyed/ /yon tan mtha' yas thub dbang yon tan sems/ /bde gshegs

thugs rje can gyi zhabs 'bring byed/ /de yi rjes la bskal pa bzang po yi/ /blo gros chen po ldan pa ji snyed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas stong du bzhis ma tshang ba dag /de dag gis kyang byams pa mdun du bdar/ /gang sngon rgyal po'i khab

kyi grong khyer 'dir/ /bskal pa dag la rgyal ba mtha' yas mchod/ /zla ba mdzes pa'i 'od 'dra lha yi lus/ /zla 'od dpa' bo yang ni mdun na 'dug /snying rje mchog gi g.yon phyogs 'dug pa ni/ /'jam dpal bye ba brgya

phrag mang po dang / /dpa' bo rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mngon 'phags pa/ /brgya phrag mtha' yas zhing du 'gro ba'o/ /de yi 'og tu nyan thos dge 'dun te/ /shA ri'i bu 'og maud gal nag po dang / /'od srung rab 'byor dga' bo ka phi

na/ /bzang ldan rgyal po de bzhin kauN+Di n+ya/ /kun dga' de bzhin gnas brtan sgra gcan zin/ /legs 'ongs kron tsi gang po 'char ba po/ /nam gru gsus chen nye 'khor ma 'gags pa/ /ral pa can ni stong du tshang ba dag /nyan

thos dge 'dun 'og tu thams cad kyang / /dka' thub drag mchog rig byed cho ga shes/ /dmod pa 'dor dang phan 'dogs nus pa yi/ /drang srong dul ba thal sbyor 'dud pa byed/ /zhi ba'i yid dang dul ba'i yid rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas

'jig rten sgron ma mdun bdar te/ /thugs rjer ldan pa'i mi yi seng ge gshegs/ /sems can stong rnams rab tu thar bar mdzad/ /ston zla tha chungs zla ba nya ba ltar/ /skar tshogs dbang po yongs su dag pa bzhin/ /tshangs

pa stong phrag dag ni brgya mang gis/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i ston pa yongs su bskor/ /grong khyer gyi ni sgo stengs zhabs bzhag tshe/ /nags tshal stug por bcas pa'i sa yang g.yos/ /lha dang lha min lto 'phye'i tshogs rnams

kyang / /me tog bzang po dri mchog 'thor bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa 'khor lo rin po ches brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa/ sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong

chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul kun du rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun du rab tu ldeg /'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun du rab tu 'khrugs/ /

chem chem rab tu chem chem kun du rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur te/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma'

na byang phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur nas 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ /ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul grangs med dpag tu med pa gzhan dag kyang snang ngo // //

'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bzhi pa/ de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /grong khyer mchog der 'dren pa gshegs pa na/ /sgo yi them pa la ni zhabs mchog bzhag

pa'i tshe/ /de yi dpal gyis sa 'di rab tu g.yos/ /grong khyer mchog 'di'i sems can rab tu dga'/ /mi gang bkres shing skom par gyur pa dag /de tshe de dag bkres pa med par gyur/ /rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs

bzhag tshe/ /bkres shing skom pa dag dang bral bar gyur/ /rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/ /dmus long gyur pa'i mi gang ci yod dang / /rna bas mi thos mgon med bsod nams chung / /de dag thams cad mig dang rna ba thob/ /

rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/ /gshin rje'i yul gyi yi dags gang yod pa/ /shin du sdug bsngal ngar snabs mchil ma za/ /thams cad 'od kyis reg pas bde bar gyur/ /rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag

tshe/ /brag gi rtse dang ri yi rtse mo dang / /shing mchog sA la dang ni dong ka rnams/ /thams cad sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i phyogs su 'dud/ /rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/ /rgya mtsho mthar thug grong dang grong khyer

rnams/ /sa kun rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ /'dir ni gang la'ang gnod par gyur pa med/ /lha dang mi dang grul bum srin po dang / /skyes bu gnas pa dga' mgu sems rangs te/ /byang chub dam pa mchog la dad bskyed

nas/ /'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa'i gdugs kyang 'dzin/ /rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/ /sil snyan stong dag ma brdungs sgra 'byin te/ /shin du yid 'ong rol mo'i dbyangs thos pas/ /de tshe sems can

thams cad rab tu dga'/ /sdong po stong phrag brgya dag 'dud par gyur/ /de tshe me tog kun kyang rab tu rgyas/ /bar snang las ni lha rnams brgya stong dag /rgyal ba la yang mi min mchod pa byed/ /rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag

tshe/ /glang po brgya dag sems dga' sgra 'byin te/ /rta dang ba glang rgyal po lus kyang stod/ /ri dgas rgyal po seng ge sgra 'byin byed/ /sa dbang rgyal po gang su ji snyed cig /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag nas lhags
pa rnams/ /rgyal ba'i dpal gzi de 'dra mthong nas ni/ /rab tu sems dga' sa la 'dug cing 'dud/ /kha cig 'jig rten mgon la mngon par bstod/ /kha cig rgyal la me tog char 'bebs shing / /kha cig sor bcu

thal mo sbyar nas su/ /e ma rgyal ba thugs rje can zhes smra/ /kha cig mu tig do shal bzang po dang / /sna tshogs rgyan mang dga' skyed 'thor bar byed/ /byang chub sems mchog dpe med bskyed nas su/ /kha cig na bza'

rin chen 'thor bar byed/ /kha cig gser gyi dra ba bzang po 'thor/ /kha cig spen tog rgyan bzang 'thor bar byed/ /la la gser gyi rgyan ni dam pa 'thor/ /kha cig de bzhin gdu bu 'thor bar byed/ /la la gdu bu bzang po de

'thor te/ /kha cig rin chen spras pa'i dpung rgyan 'thor/ /kha cig bdag cag sangs rgyas gyur cig ces/ /sems bskyed gos phran bzang po 'thor bar byed/ /'jig rten mgon po sgo na bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /mi dag kha cig gser

gyi tsong tsong 'thor/ /sems dad gtsug gi nor bu mchog kyang mthor/ /la la rin chen dra ba 'thor bar byed/ /sems can shin du mi bzad sdug bsngal zhing / /gtse ba rnam mang zug rngus zug pa yang / /'dren pa skyes bu gtso bo'i dpal

gyis ni/ /thams cad bde ba dang yang ldan par gyur/ /khu byug dang ni ri skyegs rma bya dang / /de bzhin khrung khrung dang ni mtsho bya dang / /bya mang kun ni nam mkhar 'dug nas su/ /shin du yid 'ong mchog gi sgra yang 'byin/ /

de tshe bya tshogs mang po rab dga' bas/ /'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ste/ /gang gis snyan pa'i sgra skad de thos pa/ /de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi/ /sems can bye bas dga' ba'i sgra thos nas/ /

thams cad rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod thob ste/ /ma 'ongs dus na rgyal bar khyed 'gyur zhes/ /de dag kun la bde gshegs lung yang ston/ /de yi dus na nyon mongs mi 'byung ste/ /chos kyi rgyal la thams cad ri mor

bcas/ /de tshe 'dren pa'i sku byad mthong nas ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la mos bskyed de/ /bdag cag nam zhig 'di 'dra'i mkhyen thob snyam/ /bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung ston te/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i ba spu khung re nas/ /

'od zer dag ni stong phrag brgya yang byung / /de las lhag par gang gA'i bye snyed de/ /de dag gi yang mtshan ma gzung mi nus/ /de tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyang mi snang ste/ /me dang nor bu lha kun 'od kyang med/ /rgyal ba grong gshegs sangs rgyas rnam

mdzes pa/ /de tshe 'od rnams thams cad yong mi mngon/ /tshogs chen dang ni bde gshegs lam bzhud tshe/ /gang du stobs bcu yi ni zhabs 'jog par/ /sa las pad ma dag ni stong phrag brgya/ /'dab ma bye ba stong ldan gtsang ma byung / /

'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i tshe/ /de na nyal nyil mi gtsang med par gyur/ /grong khyer thams cad dri mchog bdug pa yi/ /spos ngad yid du 'ong ba kun nas ldang / /grong dang srang rnams yongs su dag gyur te/ /rdo dang bseg

ma med cing spos chus btab/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i bsod nams de 'dra ste/ /rnam pa sna tshogs me tog sil ma bkram/ /gnod sbyin brgya stong gtum por sems pa dag /sangs rgyas mi dbang gser 'dra mthong nas ni/ /'dren la dga'

ba rgya che rab bskyed nas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun skyabs su 'gro/ /lha rnams bye ba dang ni brgya phrag stong / /mi dbang lta bar 'ongs pa de dag kun/ /bde bar gshegs la me tog char phab ste/ /me tog gtor nas nam mkha'i

dkyil na 'dug /rgyal la mi yis me tog gang gtor ba/ /nam mkha'i ngos la me tog gdugs su gyur/ /lha rnams kyis ni me tog gtor ba yang / /sa steng lha yi me tog bkram par gyur/ /lha dang mi dang grul bum srin po rnams/ /

de mthong nas ni nam yang ngoms mi myong / /mgon po stobs bcu ldan pa mthong nas kyang / /rab tu dga' zhing sems bde rangs par gyur/ /nam tshe skyes bu mchog gi sku mthong nas/ /sems can thams cad dga' mgu rangs gyur pas/ /

lha yi me tog la yang yid mi sems/ /de dag la ni ngo mtshar 'dzin pa med/ /stobs bcu'i g.yas phyogs na ni tshangs pa ste/ /de bzhin g.yon na brgya byin lha yi rgyal/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na lha mang bye 'khod de/ /skyes bu mchog

la shin tu gus pa skyed/ /lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal ba bskor/ /lha dang mi yi dpal gzi kun phrogs nas/ /zhabs mthil sa la ri mo 'byin bzhin du/ /grong khyer du ni bcom ldan spyan drangs gshegs/ /sku lus dpe

byad bzang pos brgyan pa ni/ /nam mkha' skar ma dag gis gang ba bzhin/ /nam mkha' la ni zla ba nya ba ltar/ /rgyal po'i lam na sangs rgyas lam me bzhugs/ /nor bu rin chen rnam dag bzang po ni/ /nyes pa'i skyon bral rab tu snang bar

byed/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su'ang 'od gtsang byung / /de bzhin rgyal ba 'jig rten kun snang mdzad/ /lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal ba bskor/ /mi yi gtso bo rgyal po'i khabs tu gshegs/ /zhabs mthil sa la ri mo 'byin

bzhin du/ /zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du sangs rgyas gshegs/ /grong khyer mchog ni kun du legs brgyan te/ /rgyal mtshan bye ba phrag stong rab tu sgreng / /de yi sa kun spos bzang rnam par byugs/ /yid 'ong de bzhin dbyar gyi me tog

gtor/ /gang tshe bde gshegs gtam rnams ston pa na/ /mgon po srang bzhud mi la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /rgyal bas der ni 'phrul pa rnam sprul te/ /de dag la yang sangs rgyas chos bzang ston/ /srog chags brgya stong dag

gis de thos nas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la smon lam 'debs/ /nam bdag 'di 'dra'i ye shes thob snyam ste/ /bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung yang ston/ /gang gis rgyal ba mi dbang spyan drangs pa/ /sbyin pa de ni

mu mtha' med gyur pa/ /rnyed mchog bsam gyis mi khyab des rnyed ces/ /la la dag ni de la mos pa skyed/ /'khor ba dag na shin du mthong dka' ba/ /skye dgu dag la phan mdzad thugs kyang brtse/ /thugs rje can de bdag gis

sang la yang / /spyan drang snyam du la la sems kyang skyed/ /la la ba gam cog gi steng 'dug cing / /lus ni shin du sdug cing mdzes par brgyan/ /byang chub sems mchog dam pa bskyed nas ni/ /stobs bcu ldan la lha yi mi

tog 'thor/ /la lus bla med sems mchog rab bskyed nas/ /me tog tsam pa mdzes pa'i phreng ba dang / /a ti mug ta de bzhin dbyar gyi spos/ /dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang la la 'thor/ /kha cig gos kyis shin du lus brgyan te/ /me tog

bzang po dag kyang thogs shing 'greng / /me tog sna tshogs dar gyi lda ldi thogs/ /rgyal ba thub chen de yi phyogs su 'thor/ /la la pad ma dang ni ku mu da/ /ut+pal gser gyi me tog bzang po 'thor/ /la la rin chen me tog der

'thor te/ /la la tsan dan phye ma 'thor bar byed/ /'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i tshe/ /ngo mtshar dpag tu med pa rnams kyang byung / /mtshungs med de dag brjod par mi nus te/ /sangs rgyas ye shes skye bo bye mangs bkod/ /

mi che mi gdung bden pa mthong ba dang / /gzhan yang gya nom snang dang shin du mthong / /de bzhin 'og min 'dod chags bral ba rnams/ /thams cad mi dbang blta phyir nye bar lhags/ /de bzhin dge ba'i lha rnams dpag med dang / /

dge chung lha gzhan dag kyang sems dga' zhing / /dge rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams/ /'dren pa drang srong chen po lta phyir lhags/ /tshad med 'od kyang de bzhin dpag med dang / /'od chung gi ni lha rnams ci yod dang / /

'od gsal ba yang khrag khrig mang po der/ /'jig rten mgon po blta phyir de dag lhags/ /tshangs 'khor ba dag brgya stong mang po dang / /tshangs pa'i 'dun 'don dad pa de bzhin te/ /tshangs ris kyang ni brgya phrag mang po
rnams/ /thams cad 'dren pa lta phyir nye bar lhags/ /de bzhin gzhan 'phrul gyi yang lha rnams dang / /gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i sems can dag pa dang / /dga' ldan 'thab bral lha rnams rab dga' zhing / /

thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags/ /brgya byin lha rgyal sum bcu rtsa gsum pa/ /lha yi bu mo bye ba brgya dag lhags/ /'dir ni me tog char kyang rab 'bebs shing / /sangs rgyas thub dbang blta
phyir nye bar lhags/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po yang / /rnam thos bu dang klu dbang mig mi bzang / /yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes sems dga' ste/ /de kun mi dbang bstod cing nye
bar lhags/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po mthu ldan ir bir yang / /dga' ba skyes shing gnod sbyin brgyas bskor te/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug cing sems dga' nas/ /me tog sna tshogs du ma'i char kyang

'bebs/ /rtag tu myos dang phreng 'dzin lha rnams kyang / /spos dang phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs thogs/ /'khor dang bcas pa thams cad sems dga' zhing / /de na skyes bu mchog la mchod pa byed/ /gnod sbyin

lag na gzhong thogs mang po yang / /gnod sbyin bu mo de dag rab brgyan te/ /gnod sbyin rol mo rab tu snyan pa dang / /shin du yid 'ong brgyas ni sangs rgyas mchod/ /glu dbyangs sil snyan 'jam zhing snyan pa la/ /mkhas

pa mi 'am ci yi bu mo stong / /mi 'am ci yi rgyal po ljon pa yang / /rgyal mchog mchod par spos ngad ldang las lhags/ /bde mchog stobs ldan sgra gcan thags bzang ris/ /lha min bu mo stong gi 'khor bcas dang / /lha

min rdzu 'phrul chen po gzhan mang yang / /rin po che yi char phab nye bar lhags/ /srin po khrag khrig brgya phrag mtha' yas kyang / /srin po bye ba brgya yis bsnyen bkur zhing / /me tog sil ma sna tshogs mang po yang / /
skyes bu mchog la gus par rab tu 'thor/ /klu yi rgyal po ri bo legs pa yang / /'khor mang de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags/ /rin chen me tog rnam mang mchog thogs te/ /bde gshegs zhabs gnyis la

ni rab tu 'dud/ /klu dbang pad ma dang ni pad ma che/ /de bzhin nor yod mtha' yas gdengs ka can/ /de dag khyu mchog drung du nyer lhags te/ /bde bar gshegs la gus pas rab tu 'dud/ /klu yi rgyal po nor bu yid dga' zhing / /

khyu mchog zhabs kyi drung du nye bar 'ongs/ /klu yi me tog dri zhim mchog thogs te/ /ha cang mi ring bde gshegs spyan sngar 'dug /de bzhin ma dros klu yi rgyal po yang / /klu yi bu mo shin du bslabs pa'i mchog /rnga dang sil snyan

stong phrag brgya rdung zhing / /'jig rten mgon po mchod phyir nye bar lhags/ /ma dros pa yi bu pho lnga brgya dag /ye shes yangs pa bla med tshol ba'i phyir/ /gnyen mdab dag gis bskor cing dgar gyur nas/ /rang gis rang byung mchod phyir

nye bar lhags/ /de bzhin klu yi rgyal po sog med kyang / /skyes bu mchog la thar sbyar rab btud nas/ /klu yi mu tig mdzes shing bzang ba thogs/ /mkha' la 'dug nas thub rgyal mchod pa byed/ /de bzhin klu yi rgyal po btang

bzung yang / /rab tu yid bde dga' mgu skyes nas ni/ /rin chen mu tig sna tshogs thogs nas su/ /der 'ongs 'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor/ /de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dus can yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nyer 'ongs

te/ /dga' zhing rin chen phreng ba mdzes mchog thogs/ /skyes bu dam pa la yang mchod rab byas/ /de yang bde gshegs yon tan rjes dran zhing / /gus pa chen po shin du bskyed nas ni/ /gnyen mdab klu mang dag gis de bskor cing / /

'dren pa'i bsngags pa rnam pa mang po brjod/ /de bzhin klu dbang dga' bo nye dga' dang / /de bzhin 'jog po gau tam nag po yang / /rgyal ba blta zhing der ni nye bar 'ongs/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i zhabs la 'dud pa byed/ /klu yi

rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma yang / /thub mchog rgyal ba 'od srung dran pa dang / /bdag nyid mi khom skyes pa mthong nas ni/ /klu brgyas yongs su bskor te ngu zhing 'ongs/ /kye ma bdag sngon the tshom byung gyur te/ /bdag gis e la'i 'dab

kyang sngon bcad pas/ /des ni mi khom par yang bdag skyes te/ /rgyal ba'i chos ni rig par sla ba min/ /shin du smad pa'i skye bo'i lus 'di dang / /klu yi skye gnas bdag gis rab spangs la/ /chos gang byang chub snying por skyes

mchog gis/ /rtogs pa bsil ba bdag gis rtogs par bya/ /klu yi rgyal po rgya mtsho 'khor los bsgyur/ /bye ba gsum snyed klu yi 'khor gyis bskor/ /chu lha gzi can rin chen do shal thogs/ /bcom ldan 'das la

mchod phyir nye bar 'ongs/ /rgyal ba la ni rdo 'phangs des bzung ste/ /de tshe nam mkha' la'ang 'dug gyur pa/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi gnod sbyin ci zhig 'dzin/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gus par 'dug /lcang lo can gyi rgyal

po'i gnas kun kyang / /stong par gyur cing gnod sbyin gang yang med/ /thams cad kyis kyang phan tshun dam bcas te/ /'jig rten mgon po blta bar thams cad lhags/ /de bzhin bong rna dang ni khab spu dang / /gnod sbyin 'brog gnas

'jigs byed de bzhin te/ /gangs gnas rir 'du gnod sbyin bong bu dag /rgyal ba rang byung drung du nye bar lhags/ /dbang po'i tog dang gzugs bzang rad rod can/ /bak+ku la dang dus 'phel lnga po dang / /gnod sbyin dbang po gzhan

yang stong rnams ni/ /bdug spos snod rnams thogs shing nye bar lhags/ /lus dbyibs ma legs mi sdug mang po rnams/ /gzugs kyi rnam pa mang zhing rgyan bor ba/ /de yi dus na brgya stong mang po dag /gnod sbyin gyi ni

me tog thogs te lhags/ /gau tam ri byi phur bu rgyal byed dang / /kau shi ka dang 'od srung mArkaN+Da/ /thams cad bshes dang par sha gar gA dag / /thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags/ /mi sbyin yang ni de bzhin dga' mgu ste/ /

drang srong rgyas pa kud tsa ang 'gi ra/ /shed can ngan spong bad tsa gnas 'jog rnams/ /de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags/ /'dza' man bA man be'i sham bA ya dang / /'dza' mag nI dang grog mkhar drang srong mchog /dkar bar gnas

dang mi'u thung spen pa rnams/ /'dren pa blta zhing grong khyer mchog tu lhags/ /drang srong mthong nas de tshe drang srong dga'/ /thub rgyal zhabs mchog la ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /'jig rten sgron la phyag byas mngon bstod de/ /thal mo sbyar nas

dpa' bo'i spyan sngar 'greng / /'jig rten ci yod drang srong mang po kun/ /de dag mi dbang blta bar nyer lhags te/ /mthong nas mchod pa rgya cher byas nas kyang / /sangs rgyas spyan sngar thal mo rab sbyar 'dug /rgya mtsho dag na gnas pa'i

nam mkha' lding / /bram ze'i cha byad du yang sprul byas nas/ /cod pan sna tshogs blta na sdug pa thogs/ /bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal nam mkhar 'khod/ /grong brgya dang ni 'dzam gling nags tshal na/ /gnas shing rten pa'i lha

rnams gang yod dang / /grong gi lha mo ma lus thams cad kyang / /nye bar lhags shing gtso bo mchod par byed/ /nags tshal gyi yang lha rnams mtha' yas dang / /ri yi lha rnams thams cad nye bar 'ongs/ /'bab chu'i lha kun mtha'

dag de bzhin du/ /'dren pa mchod pa byed cing nye bar lhags/ /mya ngam dgon pa'i lha mo brgya rnams dang / /ri rtse'i lha mo ji snyed ma lus dang / /mtsho dang chu mig rdzing gi lha rnams dang / /rgya mtsho'i lha yang sangs rgyas drung du lhags/ /

lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs/ /mi 'am ci dang grul bum nam mkha' lding / /de bzhin yi dags srul po mang po dag /skyes bu mchog la ri mor bya ba byed/ /'dren pa grong khyer mchog der gshegs pa na/ /rgyal ba mchog la

de dag mchod pa byed/ /lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin rgyal/ /blta bas rtag tu chog par yang mi 'gyur/ /sngon gyi srid par 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la mchod mchog byas/ /bsod nams 'bras bu smin pa

de 'dra ste/ /skyes bu mi dbang blta bas ngoms mi myong / /rgyal bas sangs rgyas zhing du 'od btang tshe/ /lhun po de bzhin rab lhun khor yug ri/ /kha ba can gyi ri dang spos ngad ldang / /de dag rgyal ba'i 'od la sgrib pa med/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di'i

rgya mtsho ci yod pa/ /de dag de tshe sa dang 'dra bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kun du yang / /me tog dag gis gtor cing mnyam par gyur/ /'od zer brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag /chos kyi rgyal po'i zhabs kyi mthil nas byung / /

sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal med par byas nas bde ba myong / /der ni stobs bcu ldan pas chos bshad pas/ /lha dang mi yi mig kyang rnam par dag /srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa

rnams/ /thams cad sangs rgyas ye shes nges par gyur/ /'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa na/ /bde gshegs cho 'phrul mang po dag gis ni/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod du mi sla ste/ /rgyal ba bde gshegs 'gro ba thams cad

dga'/ /bde gshegs yon tan de dag dpag med de/ /mi mchog yon tan rab kyi pha rol phyin/ /yon tan khyad par kun gyi pha rol son/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams zhing la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /grong khyer du gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu
pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim gyi srang du byung ste/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du gshegs so/ /gshegs nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems

dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun kyang so sor gar 'os pa'i stan la 'khod do/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas mchod

yon chen po rim kyis gsol te/ zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa bzang zhing mang ba'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang bldag pa dang bzhib pa dang btung ba rnams bdag nyid kyis gsol cing bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol

nas lhung bzed bzhag ste phyag bcabs par rig nas ras bcos bu phrugs bye ba stong phrag brgya ri ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang so sor chos gos sum phrugs

phul nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog mAn dA ras gtor te/ mchod cing mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom

ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do/ /skyes pa med cing 'gags med pa/ /sku lus mi mnga' bsam mi khyab/ /gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/ /yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo

shes rab mchog gis bskyed/ /thabs dang stobs kyi rtsal kyang mnga'/ /sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra ba ste/ /bzod mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhugs pa'i spyod yul te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims

mal rab tu dga' dang bde/ /btung bar ting nge 'dzin te bshos su bsam gtan mchog /stong nyid dgon par gnas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal bas thugs rje bsnyen pas na/ /gzugs kyi sku yang ston par mdzad/ /sems can

dag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /btung dang bshos kyang gsol bar gda'/ /e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten kun gyi 'dren pa ste/ /'jig rten 'di ni khyod mchod nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu mchi/ /mi mnyam mnyam pa'i

mgon gcig po la de skad bstod/ /gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dgar gyur tshig smras pa/ /sangs rgyas mtshungs med bsam yas sku mnga' bshos gsol bas/ /lha yi lha khyod bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur/ /de ltar zla 'od gzhon nur

gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya pa ni gzhos par gsol/ lha'i na bza' rin thang med pa phrugs kyis ni sku la gsol/ lha'i me tog mAn dA ras ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pas

ni mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas ci spyad na/ /rtag tu chos rnams rang bzhin rab

tu 'tshal/ /mkhas pa bgyi ba dag la ji ltar 'jug /bgyi bar 'jug pa 'dren pas bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar mngal dag tu yang yong mi skye/ /ji lta bur na 'khor rnams mi phyed 'gyur/ /'di la ji ltar

spobs pa mtha' yas 'gyur/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /chos rnams kun la mngon par mkhyen pa 'jug /rkang gnyis gtso bo zil gyis mi non pa/ /zhu ba zhu yis bdag la lung ston cig /chos kyi rang

bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen la/ /brjod du med pa tshig tu brjod par mdzad/ /seng ges wa rnams ji ltar pham bgyis pa/ /mu stegs gzhan la'ang sangs rgyas de bzhin te/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen cing / /chos rnams

kun la'ang ye shes rjes su 'jug /ye shes chags med spyod yul yongs su dag /chos kyi mnga' bdag bdag la de lung ston/ /'das pa mkhyen cing ma 'ongs de bzhin te/ /da ltar 'di na ci mchis pa yang mkhyen/ /dus gsum la ni

ye shes thogs med 'jug /de phyir bdag zhu shAkya seng ge la/ /dus gsum ldan pa'i rgyal ba'i chos nyid ni/ /chos kyi rgyal pos chos nyid rab tu mkhyen/ /rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas/ /de phyir bdag zhu ye shes rgya mtsho la/ /khyod

la 'khrul pa'i chos ni ci yang med/ /de bas khyod kyi sems pa ma lus spangs/ /mdud spangs tha ba gti mug rab tu bcad/ /mi dbang bdag la byang chub spyod pa ston/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid ci 'drar rgyal bas mkhyen/ /chos kyi mtshan

nyid de 'dra bdag la ston/ /bdag gis mtshan nyid de 'dra'i chos rtogs nas/ /mtshan nyid de 'dra'i byang chub spyod pa spyad/ /sems can spyod pa mi mthun mtha' yas pa/ /ji ltar spyod pa spyad par 'jug pa lags/ /gang thos sems

can spyod pa 'tshal 'gyur ba/ /spyod la 'jug pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ /mtshan nyid mi mthun chos kyi rang bzhin mtshan/ /ngo bo nyid stong rang bzhin rnam dag pa/ /byang chub sems dpas ji ltar mngon sum 'gyur/ /chos kyi tshul

rnams bdag la bstan du gsol/ /'di la chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin/ /bstan pa'i tshig kun la yang shin du mkhas/ /the tshom mi mnga' nem nur the tshom chod/ /bdag la sangs rgyas byang chub bstan du gsol/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtogs pa sems kyis mkhyen nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na yon

tan 'di dag rab tu 'thob ste/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos

thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa yin no/ /gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad

ming med cing ming dang bral bar rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad sgra med pa/ tshig gi lam dang bral ba/ yi ge dang bral ba/ skye ba dang bral ba/ 'gog pa dang bral ba/ rgyu dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa/ rkyen dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa/

dben pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam pa dang bral ba/ yid dang bral bar rab tu shes so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis

tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /chos rnams bstan pa gcig po ni/ /chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab mkhyen pas/ /shes rab mchog gis bshad pa yin/ /de lta bur ni chos bstan rnams/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa/ /mdo sde bye ba rab ston kyang / /de la byang chub rgyun 'chad med/ /'dren pas byin gyis brlabs pas na/ /yang dag nyid kyi mtha' yang shes/ /yang dag mtha' de rab shes na/ /de la ci yang bshad

pa med/ /gcig gis kyang ni thams cad shes/ /gcig gis kyang ni thams cad mthong / /ji snyed mang por bshad na yang / /de la dregs pa skye ba med/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med par/ /de ltar sems kyis nges brtags

shing / /ming du bstan pa bslabs pas na/ /yang dag nyid du tshig kyang smra/ /sgra dbyangs gang dag ci thos pa/ /de yi sngon gyi mtha' shes te/ /sgra yi sngon gyi mtha' shes nas/ /sgra dag gis ni de mi 'phrogs/ /sgra yi sngon mtha' ji

'dra bar/ /chos rnams mtshan nyid de bzhin te/ /chos rnams de ltar rab shes na/ /mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos rnams thams cad mi skye zhing / /'byung ba med par rab tu shes/ /bstan pa 'di ni rab shes na/ /rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/

nam zhig skye ba dran gyur na/ /de tshe bya ba dag la 'jug /bya ba dag la zhugs pa yi/ /'khor rnams shin du mi phyed 'gyur/ /de ltar chos rnams stong par ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa/ /des ni gang yang mi shes med/ /'di ni ci

yang med pa'i mtha'/ /ci yang med pa'i mtha' la yang / /byis pa dag gis ci dag brtags/ /bskal pa bye bar de dag des/ /yang dang yang du 'khor bar gyur/ /ji ltar 'dren pas mkhyen pa bzhin/ /gal te de dag rtog ri na/ /de las sdug

bsngal mi skye ste/ /ngan 'gro rnams su'ang de mi 'gro/ /so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis/ /de ltar tshul 'di ma shes pas/ /gang du chos rnams 'gag pa yi/ /'di 'dra'i chos rnams spong bar byed/ /chos kun rnyed pa med par ni/ /chos kyi

'du shes gang byung ba/ /de lta bu yi 'du shes te/ /'du shes de ltar rig par gyis/ /rnam par shes dang 'du shes su/ /byis pa dag gis 'di brtags te/ /brtags pa yi ni chos rnams la/ /mkhas pa 'dir ni rmongs mi 'gyur/ /stong pa rnyog

pa med pa'i chos/ /'di ni mkhas pa'i sa yin te/ /'di la byis pa'i spyod yul med/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod yul lo/ /zhi ba stong pa rab bstan pa/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas sras spyod pa/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi

rgyan yin no/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag /bag chags rab tu spangs gyur pa/ /de dag gzugs kyis mi 'phrogs te/ /sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas/ /chos rnams thams cad gnas med de/ /de dag la ni gnas yod

min/ /gang gis de ltar gnas shes pa/ /de la byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang bzod/ /bshes gnyen bzang po bsten byas nas/ /bya ba 'di dag rnam rig na/ /byang chub myur du de 'tshang rgya/ /de la lha klus rtag

tu bkur sti byed/ /gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dri za dang / /nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad dang / /mi 'am ci dang srin pos mchod pa byed/ /sangs rgyas bye ba de yi snyan pa brjod/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por mi 'chad par/ /chos

bshad pa yi bsngags pa brjod na yang / /de yi mu mtha' zad par nus mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong shes pa/ /de ni srog chags bye ba'i don mang byed/ /shin du des pas 'khor la chos ston te/ /

thos nas dga' zhing ri mor byed pa skyed/ /de dag gis ni ye shes yangs pa 'byung / /de phyir rgyal ba mi mchog mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhing rnams na yang bkod pa bzang po mthong / /'jig rten mgon po de la chos rnams ston/ /chos kun sgyu

ma lta bur shes par gyis/ /ji ltar bar snang rang bzhin stong pa ltar/ /de dag gi yang rang bzhin de 'drar shes/ /de ltar spyod pa ci la'ang chags mi 'gyur/ /ye shes chags pa med cing don byed cing / /'jig rten na yang byang chub spyad mchog

spyod/ /shes pas chos kun la'ang rab brtags te/ /de dag zhing rnams gzhan du'ang sprul pa 'gyed/ /sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas don byas nas/ /ji ltar chos nyid bzhin du rang bzhin 'gyur/ /byang chub sems la mi gang gnas pa

rnams/ /bsam pa ji bzhin don rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rigs ni gnas par gang brtson pa/ /de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas byas pa gzo/ /rnam par 'bar ba'i lus dang rab ldan zhing / /mtshan bzang sum bcu rtsa gnyis de la

'byung / /phan yon gzhan yang mang po mtha' yas pa/ /ting 'dzin mchog la spyod pas thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu mi sgul stobs kyang che bar 'gyur/ /de yi gzi brjid rgyal pos mi bzod de/ /mkhas pa su dag sangs rgyas chos spyod pa/ /

byad bzhin bzang zhing shin du mdzes par 'gyur/ /bsod nams gzi brjid dpal gyis mngon 'phags te/ /lhas kyang de yi gzi brjid bzod mi 'gyur/ /su dag byang chub sems la brtan gnas pa/ /de ni rtag tu srog chags

kun gyi bshes/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni rab ston pa/ /de la nam yang mun pa med par 'gyur/ /sgra dang tshig gi lam bral brjod du med/ /nam mkha' ji bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin te/ /'di lta bu yi tshul mchog rnam rig na/ /de yi spobs pa dag

kyang mi zad 'gyur/ /mdo sde dag ni brgya stong rab bshad kyang / /sngon gyi mtha' ma phra zhib rab tu shes/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shin du phra shes pas/ /mkhas pa'i tshig ni rtag tu thogs pa med/ /rtag par tshul brgya dag la mkhas gyur cing / /sgra dang

nges tshig rnam pa mang la mkhas/ /las dang 'bras bu rnam smin nges pa ste/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i bye brag de 'drar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa bdag nyid chen po stobs bcu'i sras/ /ma tshang med pa'i stobs kyis shugs 'chang zhing / /shin du phra

ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /de yi dran pa rtag par yongs su dag /shin du phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /yid du mi 'ong sgra ni thos mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu snyan cing yid 'ong sgra yang thos/ /de yi tshig ni rtag tu yid 'ong 'gyur/ /shin du phra

ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /dran dang blo gros shes rab rtogs dang ldan/ /de bzhin sems kyang rnyog med dang bar 'gyur/ /mdo sde brgya phrag du ma rab tu 'chad/ /yon tan 'di 'dra'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /yi ge dang ni tshig rnams 'byed

la mkhas/ /tha dad pa yi sgra mang du ma shes/ /don dang tshig 'bru la yang mkhas par 'gyur/ /shin du phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /lha dang mi dang klu 'brug srin po dang / /lha min lto 'phye mi 'am ci la yang / /rtag tu sdug cing yid du 'ong

bar 'gyur/ /shin du phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/ /'byung po yi dags srin po'i tshogs rnams ni/ /sha la za ba shin du mi zad pa/ /de dag nam yang de la 'jigs mi byed/ /mkhas pa de dag yangs pa'i gtam thos nas/ /shin du dga'

zhing ba spu zing zhes byed/ /sangs rgyas la yang dga' ba rgya cher bskyed/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab don chen 'thob/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i chos mdzod 'di bzung ba'i/ /bskal pa stong mang de yi bsod nams stobs/ /rab tu

brjod kyang rdzogs par mi nus te/ /dpag tu med cing mtha' yas tshad med do/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di bzung ba yis/ /'das pa'i rgyal ba dpag med thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu na/ /
sangs rgyas gang bzhugs de dag de yis mchod/ /skyes bu la la bsod nams 'dod pas 'dir/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i thugs rje can dag la/ /dga' ba dpag tu med pa bskyed nas ni/ /bskal pa mtha' yas dpag med

rim gro byas/ /skyes bu gnyis pa bsod nams 'dod pa yis/ /don dam tshul 'di las ni tshigs bcad gcig /phyi ma'i dus su gyur tshe 'dzin pa ni/ /de la snga ma'i bsod nams char mi phod/ /'di ni sangs rgyas mchod pa rab

mchog ste/ /phyi ma mi bzad dus su gyur pa'i tshe/ /'di las tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad gcig thos nas/ /'dzin pa des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mchod/ /de dag rtag tu rnyed mchog legs par rnyed/ /de dag grong gi zas

mchog legs par zos/ /stobs bcu'i sras kyi thu bo dam pa ste/ /de yis rgyal ba mang po yun ring mchod/ /bya rgod phung po'i ri 'dir nga yang mthong / /de dag sangs rgyas mkhyen la ngas lung bstan/ /mya ngan nga 'das nas ni

byams pa yang / /de tshe de la lung yang ston par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas tshe dpag med pa yang / /nga yi bde ba can du kun 'dod zhes/ /phan yon rnam pa du ma de la 'chad/ /mngon dga' der song sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs mthong / /

bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par yang / /logs par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa yong mi 'byung / /byang chub spyad pa mchog 'di spyod pa ni/ /rtag tu yid rab bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /de phyir bye brag 'di 'phags de 'dra ste/ /'di ni rab tu

bshad pa phan yon mchog /so so'i tshig la nga yi rjes slobs la/ /phyi ma'i dus la mdo sde 'di zung shig /mdo sde 'dzin pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // gzhon nu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po gang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa de'i yon tan dang phan yon de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par smra'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa dang med pas mi skur to/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang gis de bzhin gshegs par rab tu dbye ba'i chos nyid de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas par rab tu shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas
