'gag par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /nyen mtshan du ni bslab pa gcig spyod pa/ /bsod nams 'di ni de bas bye brag 'phags/ /skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni dam pa'i chos/ /'jig par 'gyur tshe gang dag btang snyoms sgom/ /de yis

rgyal ba bkur sti byas ma yin/ /'dren pa dag la ri mor des ma byas/ /khyed bde rang gi don gyis la/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsrung bar gyis/ /khyed ni rtag tu byams gnas shing / /'dul ba 'di la bag yod gyis/ /ma 'dres dag

gtsang dri med pa/ /tshul khrims dang por bsrung bar gyis/ /gang gis tshul khrims dri ma med/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa bsrungs pa ni/ /de yis ji snyed sngon byung ba/ /bde gshegs thams cad ri mor byas/ /de yis thams

cad bskyabs pa yin/ /skye bo'i tshogs rnams byang chub bkod/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis bstod pa yi/ /tshul khrims dri ma med pa sus bsrungs pa/ /de dag gis ni sems can mang po yang / /sems can dmyal

ba dang ni sdig las drangs/ /chos mchog rin chen sbyin pa sbyin par gyis/ /bzod pa dag kyang rtag tu bsrung gyis la/ /dgon par gnas shing ting 'dzin mkhas pa dang / /'jam zhing mnyen pa dag kyang bsgom

par gyis/ /rnam pa kun du rtsod pa ma byed par/ /spyad pa zhi mchog 'di la rnam par spyod/ /bdag ni sems can rnams kyang bskyab pa'i phyir/ /grong dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro bar bya/ /blo gros che 'chang sems

can dam pa'i mchog / /drang srong de ni 'gro bar byas pa dang / /kha cig rkang pa la yang 'ju bar byed/ /snying rje bar yang ngu zhing mchi ma zag /mkhas pa blo gros chen po ma bzhud par/ /sgra 'jam yid du 'ong

zhing mdzes pa yi/ /shing 'di rnams la gzigs shing rtog pa mdzod/ /bdag nyid bsrung ba mdzod la ma bzhud cig /sngon gyi stobs bcu 'dren pa de dag kyang / /dbang po zhi zhing shin du des pa rnams/ /nags tshal brag dang ri

yi rtser gshegs nas/ /byang chub dam pa dag ni thugs su chud/ /byang chub rgyur yang spyod pa dam pa spyad/ /de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan/ /de dag rjes slobs nags khrod gnas par mdzod/ /brtul zhugs

bzang po 'di nas ma bzhud cig /lus ni shin du mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan/ /khyod kyi skra yang mthon mthing kha dog ste/ /gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra 'od byed pa/ /sa 'di kun kyang rab tu snang bar gyur/ /khyod kyi mdzod spu bzhin

gyi smin mtshams na/ /shin du mdzes pa dung dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /rgyal po dag kyang de bzhin srid kyi phyir/ /phrag dog bskyed nas khyod kyi lus bshig 'gyur/ /de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs

chen po de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ ji snyed sngon gyi bde gshegs byung ba ni/ /thams cad mkhyen cing zag pa zad pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad 'jig rten don mdzad de/ /srid pa gsum du byang chub dam pa rtogs/ /spyad

pa'i dam pa byang chub rgyu spyad de/ /de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan/ /de yi rjes bslabs byang chub sems dpa' yang / /sems can khrag khrig rnams kyi skyabs byed 'dod/ /drang srong mkhas la kun gyis bskor byas

te/ /rkang pa la yang phyag 'tshal shugs phyung nas/ /mi bzad snying rje bar ni sgra 'byin cing / /nyam thag mi bde cho nges 'bebs par byed/ /kha cig rab tu 'gyel cing brgyal nas su/ /sa la lhung ba rtsal bcad 'gyel bzhin/ /'on kyang

drang srong sems can don 'dod pa/ /bsod nams bsags pas de las phyir ma log /drang srong chos gos lhung bzed thogs nas chas/ /ji ltar seng ge ral pa can dag bzhin/ /de ni chos kyi rang bzhin gnas pas na/ /de la

yon tan nyes par bya ba med/ /'jig rten 'dir na nags khrod bdag gnas pas/ /sems can ngan song song na ma legs shes/ /de ni sems can bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir/ /grong khyer pho brang mchog tu song bar gyur/ /de nas chos smra

ba me tog zla mdzes grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas sems can rnams la chos bstan te/ de'i snga dro der 'ongs nas srog chags khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do/ /da dung rgyal po'i pho brang der ma phyin pas de mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der phyin pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der nye bar song ste/

shing blag sha dang sA la'i drung du 'dug go/ /de de'i nub mo 'das pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs par gyur te/ zhugs nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum bcu rtsa drug sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog

par bkod kyang da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /

de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro gnyis pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gsum sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de zas gnyis

pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro gsum pa la

rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de zas gsum pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang

'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro bzhi pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan

du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de zas bzhi pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho

brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro lnga pa la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song nas

bud med brgyad khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod do/ /grong khyer de nas kyang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par

bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /de nyi ma lnga zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par

byas so/ /de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro drug pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas rgyal po'i bu stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/ /

de nyi ma drug zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ /de de'i nub mo

'das nas de snga dro bdun pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa dang rgyal po dpa' bas byin bskyed mos tshal du 'gro ba mthong ste/ gser gyi shing rta la ngos ni dngul mda' ni sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan/ 'khor

lo ni bai dUr+ya/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba dang rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ shing rta'i mda' la dar gyis bkris shing ras bcos bu phrugs kyis g.yogs pa de bu mo gzhon nu brgyad brgyas

rin po che'i tha gus btags shing 'dren te/ de dag byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa/ byis pa rnams dga' bar byed cing tshim par byed pa ste/ mkhas pa rnams

la ni ma yin no/ /rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mthon dman du 'gro'o/ /bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mthon dman du 'gro'o/ /khyim bdag

shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mthon dman du 'gro'o/ /rgyal po'i bu mo lnga brgya yang rin po che'i khyogs kyi nang du zhugs nas mdun thog thag tu 'gro ste/ de dag gis dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /btsun mo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad kyang dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par

gyur to/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu rnams bkrol te lham rnams bzhags nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ dge slong de ga la ba de logs su

thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod do/ /de nas bu mo gzhon nu de dag kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul bas khyogs de dag las babs nas nor bu dang gdu bu dag bkrol te lham rnams bzhag nas bla gos phrag pa

gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dge slong 'di ni byon pa'i tshe/ /nyi ma lta bur thams cad du/ /'di dag rab tu

snang bar bgyis/ /skye bo'i tshigs kyang 'dun par gyur/ /'dod chags zhe sdang rgyun bcad cing / /gti mug dag kyang bsal bar gyur/ /de tshe zhe sdang khro ba dang / /phrag dog thams cad bcad par gyur/ /rgyal po dpa' bas

byin pa yi/ /zhabs 'bring sras la sogs pa yang / /su yang rgyal po mi lta ste/ /su yang zhabs 'bring mi bgyid do/ /ji ltar zla ba nya ba ni/ /skar ma dag gis bskor ba bzhin/ /rgyal po'i bu yi mdun bdar bas/ /dge slong

'di yang mdzes par gyur/ /ji ltar gser gzugs ri mo dag /mkhas pas ri mor bris pa dang / /sA la'i rgyal po rgyas pa ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong mdzes par gyur/ /mthu chen brgya byin lha yi dbang po ni/ /grong khyer 'jig pa

bdag po mig stong ldan/ /ri rab spyi la sum bcu rtsa gsum dbang / /de bzhin dge slong byon pa 'di yang mdzes/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa gnas pa 'dra/ /rab 'phrul lha yi bu ni lha dbang bzhin/ /'dod khams 'thab bral

mchog gi lha bzhin du/ /dge slong byon pa 'di yang de bzhin mdzes/ /nyi ma bzhin du bar snang lhan ner bgyis/ /'od zer stong ldan mun nag rab tu sel/ /phyogs rnams kun du snang bar bgyid pa ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong byon pa

mdzes par gyur/ /bskal pa mtha' yas rgya cher sbyin pa byin/ /tshul khrims ma 'dres rtag tu bsrung ba bgyis/ /bzod pa mtshungs med 'jig rten kun du bsgoms/ /de ni mtshan gyis brgyan cing 'di ltar mdzes/ /

'phags pa'i skye bos rab bstod brtson 'grus bskyed/ /bsam gtan bzhi yang zhum med sems kyis bsnyen/ /nyon mongs dra ba bsal cing shes rab bskyed/ /de phyir dge slong 'jig rten kun du gda'/ /sangs rgyas bstan

pa mtshungs med sems can snying po ste/ /dpa' bo 'das pas chos mchog dag kyang rab tu bshad/ /ma 'ongs dus dang de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi/ /chos kyi rgyal po dbang brnyes rnams kyi sras de lags/ /dge slong khyod ni

mi rtag nam yang ma gyur cig /gzugs ni 'di ltar 'jig rten kun na rab tu lhan/ /gzi brjid che zhing dbyangs sgra shin du snyan par gda'/ /rgyal po'i gzi brjid shin du lham me snang mi bgyid/ /chos 'di ji ltar khyod

bdag nyid kyis rab rtogs shing / /sangs rgyas dag gis bka' stsal 'jig rten kun du rgyu/ /de bzhin bdag cag bud med dngos po kun spangs te/ /bdag cag thams cad dge slong 'di bzhin 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de dag thams

cad sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /tshigs bcad 'di dag smras te gos rnams 'thor bar byed/ /gser gyi phreng ba dang ni rin chen do shal dang / /rna ba'i rgyan dang mgul gyi rgyan dag rnam mang 'thor/ /ji ltar 'khor los sgyur

ba'i rgyal po dag /stobs ldan sa 'di kun la rnam par lta/ /sras su 'du shes dag ni nye bar 'jog /gling rnams bzhi po 'di dag kun du 'gro/ /rgyal rigs dang ni tshong dpon bram ze dang / /khyim bdag mkhar gyi rgyal

po bdag gi mi/ /de dag gcig la lhag par sdug pa med/ /thams cad la yang byams pa mnyam par bskyed/ /de bzhin dge slong des pa 'di yang ni/ /gzungs dang dbang rnams la ni shin du bslabs/ /byang chub yan lag

stobs dang dbang po dang / /yan lag brgyad ldan lam yang rnam par 'byed/ /mtshan mo zla ba skar tshogs dbus na yang / /ji ltar rab tu mdzes par snang ba bzhin/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba'i tshe/ /

gzi brjid ldan zhing rnam par snang bgyid bzhin/ /dbang po zhi zhing stobs bcu ldan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas nges pa kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis ni bsngags pa bskal pa brgyas/ /zad par byed nus skyes bu su yang med/ /

bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por ni/ /yon tan brjod kyang zad pa yong med de/ /'jig rten rab mchog gi ni spu gcig kyang / /bsngags pa dag ni zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /des ni mtshungs med 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /ye shes

dag gi gnas kyang shin du bstan/ /zhib cing rdul bral chos rnams bshad pa mdzad/ /de ni gang na'ang snang bar 'gyur ba med/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze lha dang klu/ /lha min bdud dang tshangs par bcas la sogs/ /sangs

rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis/ /rgya mtsho dag ni zad par yong mi nus/ /gang gis thugs sras 'di 'dra mnga' ba yi/ /sman rgyal mtshungs med rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshigs bcad 'di dag smras nas de yi

tshe/ /rgyal po'i bu mo gzhon nu thams cad dga'/ /gser dang gser phye dag kyang 'thor bar byed/ /gos rnams kyang ni rab tu 'ding bar byed/ /gtsug gi nor bu do shal mdzes pa dag /rin thang bye ba phrag ni brgya ri bas/ /

dge slong de la mngon par g.yogs nas ni/ /dga' nas byang chub phyir yang rab tu zhugs/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma btsun mo'i 'khor 'di dag ni log par zhugs te skye bo'i tshogs

kyang log go snyam mo/ /skye bo de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu bkrol lham bzhag nas gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar

nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong de byad gzugs bzang ba tsam du rgyal po dpa' bas byin byad bzhin mi bzang / de tsam du blta na sdug pa ma yin/ de tsam du mdzes pa ma yin te/ de rgyal po'i srid kyi phyir shin du sdangs par gyur to/ /dge slong

de'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa mthong nas shin du khros so/ /dge slong de rgyal po'i lam na 'dug pa'i mig tu rdul song ba dang de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas te/ 'dis

mig gis kyang brda byas so/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ da dge slong 'di la srog gcod par byed pa su yod snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyi zhabs 'bring du bu stong 'brang ba de dag bos nas gzhon nu dag dge slong 'di srog dang phrol cig

ces byas na/ gzhon nu de dag rgyal po dpa' bas byin la slar zlog go/ /dge slong de'i phyir de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu dag kyang bka' mi nyan te/ bdag gcig pu gnyis su med par bzhag na da dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar

byed pa su yod snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin la gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed ces bya ba gtum po btsam pa med pa ma rungs pa zhig yod pa de rgyal po'i lam na rgyal po dpa' bas byin dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go/ /rgyal

po dpa' bas byin gyis de mthong nas dga' mgu yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang mos pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas de sems 'di snyam du sems te/ dga' byed 'dis dge slong 'di srog dang dbral bar byed snyam mo/ /de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma

dga' byed rgyal po dpa' bas byin gang na 'dug pa der 'ongs pa dang dga' byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod bya dga' cher sbyin na dga' byed khyod dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar byed nus sam/ dga' byed kyis smras pa/ lha shin du rngo thog go/ /

bka' bzhin 'tshal/ da dge slong 'di srog dang dbral bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ dga' byed de'i phyir de'i dus la bab par shes na mtshon rnon po thogs la dge slong 'di'i lag pa dang rkang pa chod cig /rna ba dang sna yang chod cig /

'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas kyis de'i phyir 'di'i mig kyang skam pas phyung shig ces byas so/ /de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed kyis de'i tshe ral gri rnon po thogs nas dge slong de'i

lag pa dang rkang pa bcad do/ /rna ba dang sna yang bcad do/ /mig gnyis kyang phyung ngo / /de nas dge slong de'i mgo dang rna ba dang rkang lag bcad pa las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang byung / 'o ma'i rgyun du ma yang byung ste/ phyogs bcur

bskor nas slar yang dge slong de'i lus kyi nang du nub bo/ /bcad cing gtubs pa'i 'phro nas dpal be'u dang bkra shis dang 'khor lo la sogs pa nang nas byung ste skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kun du snang ngo / /de nas rgyal

po de skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang dong nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po des dge slong de lam na bcad gtubs shing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ ngo mtshar du gyur nas ngu zhing cho nges btab ste smre sngags bton nas phyir yang rgyal

po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan par song ngo / /de nas rgyal po dpal bas byin zhag bdun 'das pa dang bskyed mos tshal mchog na 'dug pa mi dga'/ mi rtsi yongs su mi spyod de/ bskyed mos tshal nas de logs nas zhag bdun 'das pa

dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa dang des dge slong de rgyal po'i lam du bor ba shi nas zhag bdun lon yang lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'di'-i lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa las

bltas na dge slong 'di ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/ bdag gis sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa'i las byas kyis bdag ni myur du sems can

dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes de de ltar sems pa na/ steng gi bar snang las lha'i bu brgyad khris sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu smras pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ni de bzhin te/ khyod ji skad zer ba ltar dge slong 'di ni bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no zhes zer ro/ /bar snang las lha dag gi sgra thos nas de shin du 'jigs shing skrag nas bag tsha zhing spu zing zhes byed de 'gyod par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin sdug

bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod par gyur pas de'i tshe cho nges cher btab nas tshig 'di skad zer ro/ /rgyal po'i srid dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang / /nor bu rin chen mu tig gser dbyig spang / /bdag nyid mtshon thogs bdag nyid 'chi bar

bya/ /bdag ni byis pa'i blo can las ngan ldan/ /dge slong me tog zla mdzes 'dir byung ba/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te/ /snang bar byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang 'ongs/ /zla ba nya tshe skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin/ /'dod

pa'i longs spyod ngan pas bdag dkrugs te/ /rab tu dga' bar bud med tshogs rnams dang / /shing rta'i nang du zhugs te de nas dong / /rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su 'khor bar bskor/ /dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'di nyid

ni/ /'dir byon dge slong de'ang mthong nas su/ /bud med tshogs rnams rab tu dgar gyur cing / /mos pa skyes nas gser gyi phreng ba gtor/ /thams cad sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis dge

slong de la bstod/ /rgyal po yi ni klu yi dbyangs sgra rnams/ /de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur/ /de yang shing rta'i nang du zhugs nas ni/ /rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i

sras mchog mthu che ba/ /dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'dir byon na/ /bdag gi sems ni rab tu ngan gyur te/ /dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug pa'i tshe/ /bud med tshogs chen dga' bar lta mthong nas/ /rmongs pas

de la phrag dog khro ba bskyed/ /phyogs bzhi kun du snang bar bgyis pa ni/ /zla ba sgra gcan zin thar mdzes pa bzhin/ /dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug mthong nas/ /bud med tshogs rnams dga' zhing sgra yang 'byin/ /bdag gis

der ni gtum po'i tshig smras te/ /bu stong dag la nga nyid khyod song la/ /dge slong 'di ni dum bu dum bur gyis/ /'di ni nga yi dgra mchog ma rungs pa/ /gzhon nu thams cad mnyen zhing tshul ldan te/ /bdag la phan sems dge slong

de la 'dud/ /rgyal po 'di 'dra'i bka' bzhin bgyir mi rung / /de tshe bdag ni mya ngan non par gyur/ /dge slong shin du tshul khrims mchog ldan pa/ /byams ldan pha bzhin zhugs pa mthong nas ni/ /shin du gtum pa'i sems kyis gsod

du btang / /phyi dus bdag ni lhung nas mnar med sreg /dga' byed de ni rgyal po'i lam 'dir gnas/ /ma rungs las bgyid mi la sdug bsngal skyed/ /bdag gi bka' bzhin de 'drar des bgyis te/ /me tog phreng brgyus 'dra ba'i

dge slong gtubs/ /nags mchog kun du bzang po dga' ba na/ /bya yis gang zhing me tog dri zhim rgyas/ /de na dge slong tshogs gzhan rab mang ba/ /bu gcig pa ni ma dang bral ba bzhin/ /dge slong bzhengs la nags su gnas

par mdzod/ /mi yi don kyang shin du rgya cher bgyis/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir byon pa'i tshe/ /dge slong shin du snying rjer ngu zhing tshol/ /lag pa g.yas pas me tog rgyal mtshan thogs/ /g.yon pa yis kyang blta sdug mdzes pa

gzhan/ /lam yang sbyangs shing gos kyis khebs par g.yogs/ /dge slong bzhengs la chos mchog bshad pa mdzod/ /rgyal po'i khab 'dir khyod zhugs ring lon kyang / /dge slong rab tu snying rjer ngu zhing tshol/ /rgyal ba mchog gi

bstan pa 'jig pa'i tshe/ /khyod kyi srog gi bar chad 'gyur du dogs/ /ji ltar skyes bu mthu chen la la dag /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rtag tu sgra grags pa/ /srid gsum 'di kun thams cad zil mnan nas/ /g.yang sa chen

por mchongs te sar lhung ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong mtshan mchog rab brgyan pa/ /byad bzhin bzang po sa 'dir 'gyel bar gyur/ /me tog zla mdzes zhe sdang gtum med pa/ /bdag gi sdig pa'i sems kyis dum bur blags/ /

me tog zla mdzes bkrongs nas sar lhung ba/ /chos smra 'di ni mthong nas myur bar yang / /dge slong thams cad sdug bsngal gzer gyur te/ /mi dga' skyes 'gyur de bzhin sems mi bde/ /me tog zla mdzes ri yi rgyal po ltar/ /sum

bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te/ /phreng ba brgyus pa bud med thogs pa 'dra/ /'dir ni dum bu dum bur rnam par bcad/ /bdag gis dngos sdig shin du mi bzad bgyis/ /mgon med mnar med gshin rje'i yul du mchi/ /

'dir yang dge slong dum bur rlags pa yis/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams dang ring bas ring / /bdag gis shin du las ngan bgyis pas na/ /bu dang gnyen bshes tshogs rnams skyabs mi 'gyur/ /blon po dang ni zhabs 'bring bkrabs pa

yang / /de dag dmyal bar bdag song skyabs mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang / /phyogs bcu dag na gang su bzhugs pa yi/ /ded dpon stobs bcu nyon mongs med pa rnams/ /rdo rje stug sra sku mnga'i skyabs su mchi/ /

der ni dge slong dum bur byas mthong nas/ /lha rnams rab tu snying rje cho nges 'debs/ /de dag der song dge 'dun go bar byas/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /chos smra ba ni mkhas shing rtogs pa de/ /mthu chen

phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab tu grags/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gnas pa de/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin pa sna tshogs byin/ /tshul khrims mi g.yo skyon

med gang srung zhing / /'jig rten kun du mtshungs med bzod sgom pa/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /bskal pa mtha' yas rtag tu brtson ldan zhing / /zhum med sems kyis bsam gtan bzhi la sgom/ /

nyon mongs 'joms pa'i shes rab gang bsten pa/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /lus la phangs pa thams cad rab spangs shing / /de bzhin srog la ma chags gyur nas ni/ /kun du bzang po'i nags nas

babs nas su/ /me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/ /lha yi cho nge'i snying rje thos nas ni/ /dge slong de kun shin du sdug bsngal nas/ /me tog zla mdzes nyes med bsad pa la/ /lta ba'i phyir yang thams cad grong

du lhags/ /des pa de dag rgyal po'i khab 'ongs nas/ /dge slong dum bu dum bur byas mthong ste/ /nyam thag skad kyis mi bzad cho nges 'debs/ /de dag thams cad brgyal nas sa la 'gyel/ /dge slong dge 'dun rgyal po de

la smra/ /tshul khrims skyon med shin du bsdams pa yi/ /dge slong 'dis ni nyes pa ci zhig byas/ /'di ni sngon gyi skye ba bsam yas dran/ /'di ni ye shes gzungs dbang pha rol phyin/ /'di ni 'dus byas 'di dag stong par shes/ /

'di ni 'gro ba dag la mtshan med ston/ /'di ni smon lam 'du shes thams cad spangs/ /'di ni yid 'ong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byin/ /'di ni nges shing dbang po rab tu zhi/ /'di ni sngon gyi gnas kyi pha rol phyin/ /'jig rten thams

cad las kyang mngon par 'phags/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rang byung ye shes kyis/ /khyu mchog gyur cing 'jig rten ri mor byas/ /dag cing rab rib med pa'i mig gis lta/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje shin du che/ /'dod pa ngan cing gtsog

la sdug bsngal bskyed/ /mtho ris rnam par ma rung byed pa ste/ /'dod pa bsnyen na rna ba med par 'gyur/ /mi dag shes rab dang yang bral bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na/ /long bar 'gyur zhing pha dang ma yang

gsod/ /'dod pa bsnyen byas tshul khrims ldan pa gsod/ /de bas mi yis 'dod pa rnam par spang / /rgyal pos 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na/ /sa bdag dam pa 'byor pa 'di bor nas/ /mi bzad sdug bsngal rtsub byed sems dmyal

nas/ /sems can dmyal ba 'jigs pa chen por 'gro/ /'di 'dra'i dge slong mkhas pa gsod byed de/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa/ /sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs spang bar bya/ /

lus ni sgyu ma gsog dang 'dra ba dang / /de bzhin rna mig sna lce rig nas ni/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri mchog dang / /reg bya chos rnams zhum med sems kyis gtong / /sbyin la bslabs shing tshul khrims mnyam pa med/ /

bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus de bzhin te/ /bsam gtan sten cing shes rab pha rol song / /sems can dag gi don kyang rab tu byed/ /'jig rten lha dang mir bcas thams cad kyang / /byams pas rgyal ba la ni rab tu lta/ /

de phyir mig ni mun gnag gtibs gyur kyang / /byang chub zhi ba nyid ni 'tshang rgya 'gyur/ /rta dang bal glang yang thogs khri rnams dang / /khyogs dang sngas rnams kyang ni de bzhin te/ /glang po dag dang bzhon dang dgal ba dang / /

grong dang yul 'khor dga' ba gtong bar byed/ /grong khyer dang ni rgyal srid yongs gtong zhing / /gser dang dngul dang shel dang byi ru dang / /de bzhin gnas dang bu dang bu mo dang / /rang gi mgo yang gtong zhing byang chub zhugs/ /

me tog dang ni spos dang bdug pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan lha yi ba dan dang / /rol mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs thogs nas ni/ /dga' nas mchod pa mtshungs pa med pa byed/ /srid pa dag ni stong par shes nas kyang / /

srid pa'i 'gro ba dag la dga' mi byed/ /de phyir stobs bcu mtshan gyis rnam brgyan cing / /phyogs bcu thams cad du yang snang bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /'dod pa'i khams rnams
dang ni gzugs kyi khams/ /gzugs med khams la de dag mi chags te/ /khams gsum dag la snga nas chags pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /bdag tu 'du shes sems can
'du shes med/ /srog tu 'du shes gang zag 'du shes med/ /tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dres rtag tu spyad/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /dngos por 'du shes dngos med 'du shes med/ /bde bar
'du shes mi bder 'du shes med/ /grangs su 'du shes grangs med 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /yod par 'du shes med par 'du shes med/ /bud med 'du shes skyes par
'du shes med/ /grong gi 'du shes grong khyer 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /yul 'khor 'du shes grong mdab 'du shes med/ /'dod chags 'du shes 'dod bral 'du shes med/ /zhe

sdang 'du shes sdang bral 'du shes med/ /gti mug 'du shes rmongs bral 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /nga rgyal nga rgyal bral ba'i 'du shes med/ /ma rig ma rig ma yin 'du shes
med/ /lta dang lta ba ma yin 'du shes med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/ /de dag dbang po stobs la mi chags te/ /byang chub yan lag bsam gtan chags pa med/ /khams gsum nyes pa

thams cad rab tu spongs/ /'dod chags chags med zhe sdang gtum pa med/ /gti mug rmongs med rtag tu g.yo med 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas stobs bcu mthong nas bkur sti byed/ /blo gros ldan pa mtho ris smon mi byed/ /su dag gzhan las chos

mchog thos nas ni/ /de la nam yang nem nur mi byed pa/ /'bru mar gang ba'i snod bzhin dang zhing dag /bcad dang ma bcad gzhan gyi blo yang shes/ /mdza' ba byas na rjes su chags pa skye/ /de yang nyon mongs pa ni chen po yin/ /zhe sdang byas na khong

khro skye bar 'gyur/ /dgra dang 'jigs pa sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung / /'di gnyis rab tu rnam par spang byas te/ /blo gros ldan pa dag ni byang chub zhugs/ /de dag mi yi khyu mchog stobs bcur ni/ /'jig rten du yang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

nang dang phyi rol dag kyang rnam spangs te/ /chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rab gnas shing / /tshul khrims phung po dag kyang rnam par sbyangs/ /ral ba med cing ma 'dres skyon yang med/ /nam yang de dag gi ni tshul khrims dag /'phags shing 'dres pa dag tu

mi 'gyur te/ /mtha' 'di dag ni gnyis po yongs spangs nas/ /blo gros 'chang ba byang chub zhi rtogs 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun las chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyi yon tan bye brag chen po yangs

shing rgya che ba thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ nags khrod stug po kun du bzang po ni/ /sdong po chen pos gang zhing 'bras bus mdzes/ /dus kun skye

ba me tog sdug pas brgyan/ /sna tshogs tha dad bya rnams sgra yang 'byin/ /gser gyi ri yang mdzes shing mtho bas brgyan/ /mi'am ci yi glu dbyangs snyan pa dang / /rol mo shin du thabs ldan yid 'ong grag /grub pa'i bu mo rtag tu gar

yang byed/ /nags de lha yi dga' ba'i tshal bzhin te/ /gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar ba yi shing gis dkrigs/ /me tog rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad bkram/ /ud pal pad mos brgyan cing chu yang 'bab/ /'di 'dra ba yi nags mchog nyams

dga' ba/ /drang srong rtag tu gnas par 'thun pa dag /bor nas sems can don dang phan bzhed pas/ /sdig pa'i phung po bdag drung grong du byon/ /de ltar chos smra yon tan 'chang ba 'di/ /me tog zla mdzes grong khyer 'dir byon te/ /byon nas sdig

pa bgyid pa bdag gis bkrongs/ /'di bkrongs pas ni bdag kyang dmyal bar ltung / /byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje'i stobs ldan gang / /dpa' bo sems can phan phyir 'jig rten spyod/ /de dag sdig bgyid bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig /byang chub

sems dpa' de skyabs bdag mchi'o/ /gang yang rang rgyal dag ni gnyis pa dang / /gang gzhan nyan thos rdzu 'phrul ldan pa ste/ /zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal mnar med mchi ba skyobs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das

kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus dang srog la ma chags par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo lus dang srog la chags pa'i

sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rtag tu rul ba'i lus 'di dang / /srog kyang g.yo zhing dbang med de/ /rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra ba la/ /sems can gang dag chags pa ni/ /shin

du ma rungs las byas nas/ /gti mug dbang song de dag ni/ /sems can dmyal ba mi bzad par/ /mi mkhas bdud kyi bzhon bas song / /dbu ba rdos 'dra'i lus dang ni/ /chu yi chu bur 'dra srog la/ /mi gang chags par mi byed pa/ /de dag

'gro ba mchog tu 'gro/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas lus dang srog la mi lta bar byas te/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de dben pa na bde bar gnas pa

dang dgon pa dang nags khrod spangs te grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang ri khrod rnams su zhugs te/ ci nas sems can de dag nyan thos kyi byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog

pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan

pa 'di nyid rgya cher tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas par rab tu bstan to/ /ngas sngon spyad pa dag ni spyod pa na/ /de tshe rgyal po dpa' bas byin par gyur/ /rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan zhes bya/ /bskyed mos tshal gyi sar ni byung bar gyur/ /

shing rtar zhugs pas de tshe dge slong mthong / /kun nas mdzes shing blta na sdug pa ste/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa/ /phyogs rnams thams cad du yang snang bar byed/ /me tog zla mdzes phyogs su grags pa ste/ /snying rje gnas

pa phan zhing snying brtse ba/ /dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis mdzes pa ni/ /sems can rnams la brtse phyir grong du 'ongs/ /nga ni gzugs kyang de tsam mi phod pas/ /de la nga yang 'jungs pa ma rungs skyes/ /'dod la chags shing srid la bcings

pas na/ /'di ni bdag gi srid las skyod snyam ste/ /nga yi bu rnams stong du tshang ba yang / /shing rtar zhugs shing zhabs 'bring mthon dman 'gro/ /cod pan dang ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sum bcu dbang phyir lha yi bu 'brang bzhin/ /de na nga yi

bu mo lnga brgya dag /nor bu thogs shing lham gyon blta na sdug / /mgo rgyan dang ni lhab lhub rgyan gyis spud/ /de dag gser gyi dra bas shing rta 'dren/ /nga yi bud med dag ni brgyad khri yang / /gzugs mdzes shin du blta na sdug pa dag /shing

rtar zhugs pas dge slong de mthong ste/ /r-i rab bzhin du gzugs bzang dpal 'bar ba/ /mthong nas de dag phar yang 'du shes bskyed/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skyes te/ /de tshe tshangs pa'i spyod par yang dag btsud/ /yid du 'ong ba'i

rgyan rnams de la gtor/ /de tshe nga ni phrag dog skyes par gyur/ /gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba mi bzad de/ /dbang phyug rgyags pas bu la 'di skad smras/ /mdun na 'dug pa'i dge slong bsad par gyis/ /gzhon nu de dag nga yi tshig thos nas/ /

shin du sdug bsngal yid kyang mi dgar gyur/ /yab cig de skad kyi ni tshig ma gsung / /dge slong 'di 'dra bdag cag mi 'gums so/ /bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /bdag cag lus dang yan lag bcad gtubs kyang / /dge slong 'di ni

'gums par mi bgyid de/ /'di ltar bdag cag byang chub sems skyes so/ /rgyal po de tshe bu yi tshig thos nas/ /khros te gsod pa'i gshed ma 'bangs la smras/ /nga yi btsun mo'i mdun na 'dug pa yi/ /dge slong 'di ni myur du sod de phul/ /

de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma phyi bzhin 'ongs/ /shin du gtum sems dga' byed snying rje med/ /'bru mar ngar btags ral gri thogs nas su/ /de yis dge slong dum bu brgyad du byas/ /de yi lus dang yan lag bcad pa las/ /

khrag kyang mi zag 'od zer stong byung ste/ /bcad pa'i 'phro na dpal be'u 'khor lo dag /mtshan rnams de yi lus kyi nang na yod/ /shin du ma rungs las ni byas nas su/ /bskyed mos tshal du de yi mod la byung / /dge slong me tog

zla mdzes dran nas ni/ /de yi rtsed mo dga' bar ma gyur to/ /rings pa'i gzugs su myur zhing mgyogs par ni/ /de nas bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang song / /gang du dge slong dum bu brgyad byas pa/ /sa phyogs der ni shing rtar zhugs nas

phyin/ /lha rnams khrag khrig mang po bar snang la/ /cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra dag des thos te/ /rgyal po khyod kyis mi dge sdig mang bgyis/ /shi 'phos nas ni mnar med mi bder 'gro/ /rgyal po des ni lha yi sgra thos nas/ /shin du

sdug bsngal mi dga' sems skrag gyur/ /bdag gis me tog zla mdzes bkrongs pa ni/ /bdag gis sdig pa mi bzad mang po bgyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas ldan/ /sangs rgyas mi yi khyu mchog sras po gang / /

dbang po bsrungs shing des pa zhi ba'i yid/ /de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams gang 'dzin cing / /zad pa'i dus la dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /'jig rten kun du chos kyi sgron ma mdzad/ /de ni

'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/ /'jig rten kun na sman pa'i rgyal po gang / /sems can na ba rtag tu gso byed cing / /bdud rtsi dag gis bkru sman gtong ba yi/ /dge slong bdag gis 'dod pa'i don phyir bkrongs/ /zhib cing zab

la zhi ba blta dka' ba'i/ /chos rnams skye dgu dag la gang 'chad cing / /byang chub snying po mchog kyang gang ston pa/ /de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/ /'dren pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin cing / /'jig rten ldongs pa'i sgron

mar gyur pa ste/ /gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po gang 'dzin pa/ /de ni ci slad bdag gis 'dod phyir bkrongs/ /nyon mongs med cing rnam dag ye shes can/ /zhi ba rab zhi rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa/ /'dod pas ldongs pas bdag gis deng bkrongs te/ /

des ni shin du ma rungs dmyal bar ltung / /sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang / /mi yi dam pa rgyal ba gang yang bzhugs pa ni/ /bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams/ /de dag kun la thal mo

sbyar te skyabs su mchi// // 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes bsad de shi ba'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur par sa

la 'gyel cing 'dug pa mthong nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod cing myos par gyur nas de'i tshe cho nges rab tu cher btab po/ /chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de la yang 'di lta bur yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bstod pa dang snying rje dang ldan

pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kun du bzang por 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis/ /khyod la rnam pa mang po bsgo ba bgyis/ /khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byung ta re/ /rin chen ldan par rgyal po'i khab ma bzhud/ /khyod kyis dge slong dge 'dun

tshig ma bzung / /mgon po grong khyer du ni ci slad byon/ /khyod ni gang gi don du byon pa yi/ /don de sgron ma mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ /lha rdzas myu gu sna tshogs brgyan pa'i sa/ /gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar shing ljon mang pos dkrigs/ /

grub pa'i rig 'dzin gnod sbyin mchog gis bsrungs/ /lha rnams zhugs shing bya rgyal sgra yang sgrog /kun du bzang po sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs pa/ /nags tshal dam pa dga' ba bor nas ni/ /bgyi ba gang phyir khyod ni 'dir byon pa/ /des pa

bgyi ba de deng bdag la gsungs/ /khyod kyi tshig thos nas ni bka' bzhin bgyi/ /sangs rgyas sras po bzhengs la bka' stsol cig /kye ma da ni ci bgyi lha yi lha/ /bdag ni mgon med khyod kyi skyabs su mchi/ /gcig pu seng ge ri dgas

rgyal po ltar/ /dge slong dge 'dun mchog gi khyu bor nas/ /sems can mtha' yas pa la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /rang gi srog kyang btang ste 'dir byon na/ /'dod chags zil non shin du 'jungs pa yis/ /bdag gis dpa' bo dum

bu dum bur bcad/ /'di ni dge slong dge 'dun mtha' dag kyang / /khyod la lta bar pho brang ma lhags par/ /bdag ni 'jigs skrag khyod la ci gsol pa/ /bde bar gsol ba gcig ni mdzad par 'os/ /me tog zla mdzes mi

'jigs bdag stsol la/ /nya dus zla ba nya 'drar bzhengs su gsol/ /sems can gtso bo bdag la gnang bar mdzod/ /chos smra khyod ni zhe sdang rnam par grol/ /de ring bdag la sna gcig gnang bar mdzod/ /nyi ma bzhin du snang
mdzad bzhengs su gsol/ /chos smra mchog ni bdag gis bkrongs bgyis te/ /sdig pa ma legs bdag gis deng bgyis pa/ /'di nas 'chi 'phos mi bzad dmyal bar skye/ /bdag la de yi skyabs su 'gyur ba med/ /

nyon mongs byed pa sdig sems ci ru rung / /rgyags pas khengs pa'i rgyal srid ci ru rung / /thams cad spangs te gcig pu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'di nas bdag gis snying po ci ma blangs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang bcom pa rnam dag chos/ /

snyan par gsung ba bdag thul thugs rje can/ /'gro ba'i gnyen gcig sun 'byin mi mdzad pa/ /me tog zla mdzes bdag gis ci phyir bkrongs/ /kye ma bzod dang dka' thub nor phyug brtul zhugs bzang / /kye ma gzugs dang

des pa dag gi yon tan ldan/ /kye ma g.yo med dpal stug spros pa mi mnga' ba/ /bdag cag bor nas khyod ni gang du bzhud par mdzad/ /'phags pa khyod kyi lus dang yan lag bcad pa na/ /'o ma rab tu zag cing 'od zer stong dag

byung / /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad shin du ngo mtshar gyur/ /ngo mtshar che ba'i rang bzhin 'dren pa bzhengs su gsol/ /kye ma me tog zla ba dul ba thugs rje can/ /kye ma byams dang snying rje'i phung po ri bo tshur/ /kye ma chos rnams zab

mo shin du ston pa'i mchog /lha khyod bzhengs shig bdag la thugs brtser mdzad du gsol/ /kye ma zla ba nya zhal tshur spyon cig /kye ma sa bcu legs gnas tshur spyon cig /kye ma dpa' bo stobs bcu mngon 'phags pa/ /

tshe la khyod dbang bdag po gang du bzhud/ /kye ma dpa' bo tshur spyon bdag la gsungs/ /khyod kyis yun ring bzod pa bsgoms pa dang / /brtson 'grus thugs rje de dag gang du mchis/ /byams pa chen po bzhengs la gsung

phyung zhig /kye ma shin du mchod 'os lha yi lha/ /chos smra cang mi gsung bar ci slad bzhugs/ /mkhas pa bzhengs la bdag gi khyim du bzhud/ /bud med tshogs la khyod kyis chos ston cig /lha khyod lus ni gcad par

mi nus te/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin srin pos kyang / /khyod kyi lha yi lus 'di mi shigs kyis/ /mkhas pa khyod deng sgyu dag ma mdzad cig /lha khyod sgyu mdzad bzhugs pa ga la gda'/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sgyu ma mi mdzes so/ /sgyu ma thams cad spongs la bzhengs su gsol/ /rin chen ldan pa'i grong du chos shod cig /kye ma 'phags pa me tog zla mdzes tshur/ /kye ma khams gsum 'dod chags bral ba tshur/ /

kye ma pha ma lta bu 'dren pa tshur/ /bdag gi sems dmyal sgo ni bcad du gsol/ /ngan song skyes pa rnams kyi rten dang dpung / /srog chags mnar med chen por lhung ba yi/ /skyabs mdzad me tog zla mdzes tshur spyon

cig /bdag gi bde 'gro'i sgo yang dbye bar gsol/ /mgon po khyod ni dgung bdun bshos ma gsol/ /re shig deng bzhengs bdag gi bshos gsol cig /bdag gis bshos gsol rin chen ldan pa 'dir/ /sems can du ma chos la

dgod pa mdzod/ /kye ma chos mchog rtogs pa bdag gi yab/ /kye ma sems can rnams la khon med sems/ /kye ma tshur spyon bdag mdun chos ston cig /kye ma tshur spyon khyod smon myur grub shog /dge slong dge 'dun de ni mgon med gyur/ /

kye ma mdongs shing mi dran mya ngan bgyid/ /sems can snying po khyod ni myur bzhengs la/ /dge slong dge 'dun dbugs kyang dbyung bar mdzod/ /kye ma 'jig rten gsum na sgron gyur pa/ /kye ma tshur spyon kun du bzang por bzhud/ /kun

du bzang po'i nags khrod bzhud nas ni/ /dge slong dag la phan phyir khyod ston cig /kye kye chos 'dzin yon tan rmad byung che/ /a shwad me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'/ /shes rab thugs rje'i spyan ni dri med pa/ /kye kye dge

slong dge 'dun gzigs su gsol/ /tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i gzugs de yang / /kye kye dge slong dag la bstan du gsol/ /kye kye zla ba shar ba bzhin du 'dir/ /me tog zla ba de ring bzhengs su gsol/ /kye kye rgyal sras bdag

la thugs brtse ba/ /dbugs 'byin mdzad pa ston pa bla na med/ /kye kye mtshon dang dbyug pas btab pa bzod/ /bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing rab tu des/ /kye kye me tog zla mdzes thugs rje can/ /rab sbyin 'dren pa khyod ni

bzhengs su gsol/ /kye kye khyod ni bzhengs la bdag la yang / /mthong bar dka' ba'i gzungs rnams bshad du gsol/ /kye kye 'jig rten kun du snang mdzad pa/ /shes rab kyi ni sgron ma dam pa'i mchog / /kye kye sems can dag gi

phan don la/ /brtson mdzad 'dren pa thugs rje'i stobs dang ldan/ /kye kye me tog zla mdzes bzhengs su gsol/ /dpa' bo sems can dag gi don mdzad pa/ /kye kye sems can dag ni bye ba dang / /khrag khrig rnams kyang zhi ba'i grong du

khod/ /kye kye tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros che/ /mkhas pa bslabs pa'i nor gyis shin du phyug /kye kye tshul khrims brtul zhugs rab gnas shing / /chos kyi shing gi myu gu mngon par dga'/ /kye kye chos gos ngur smrig kha bsgyur 'chang / /

rtag tu mngon par byung la dga' bar mdzad/ /kye kye me tog zla ba brtul zhugs mchog /rab sbyin dka' thub bzang po khyod bzhengs shig /kye kye dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul/ /rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan/ /kye kye dul ba rab

dul rjes su bzhud/ /zhi ba dbang po rab zhi khong nas des/ /kye kye sems can nyal zhing gnyid log pa/ /chos kyi sgra yis rtag tu sad par mdzod/ /kye kye sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag /sad par bgyis nas theg pa mchog la

khod/ /kye kye sbyin pa yi ni spang leb la/ /brtson 'grus thag gus sbrel ba'i gru sbyor te/ /kye kye sems can rgya mtsho chen por ni/ /rab tu lhung zhing srid pas ded pa rnams/ /kye kye stobs bcu ldan pa me tog mchog /mnyan pa gdos 'dzin

mkhas pa bzhengs su gsol/ /kye kye shin du sra ba'i grur yang ni/ /zhugs nas bdag dang de dag bsgral bar mdzod/ /kye kye sman pa'i dam pa brtul zhugs la/ /shin du spyad cing rig mdzad sman pa'i mchog /kye kye ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin/ /

dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi dag sbyin mdzad pa/ /kye kye nad ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /btab pa'i sems can na ba rnams gzigs nas/ /kye kye myur du bzhengs la de dag la/ /chos kyi sman rnams shin du stsal bar mdzod/ /kye kye ye shes sman

pa'i rgyal po mchog /mtshungs med ye shes 'phags shing pha rol phyin/ /kye kye nad rnams shin du gso mdzad cing / /thugs rjes sems can dag gi don kyang mdzad/ /kye kye na bar gyur pa'i sems can khams/ /'dod

chags nad kyis ma lus bcom pa rnams/ /des ni sems can thams cad bde ba dang / /nad rnams med cing mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /kye kye mkhas pa ye shes rgya chen bslabs/ /chos kyi rnga dag shin du brdung bar mdzod/ /kye kye

'jig rten gyi ni the tsom gyi/ /'khri shing thams cad ye shes rgya mtshos chod/ /kye kye legs thos chos rnams 'dzin mdzad pa/ /rdul bral mdo sde bye ba brgya dag kyang / /'khor gyi nang du gdan la rab bzhugs la/ /mi mchog mkhas

pa brjod pa mdzad du gsol/ /me tog zla ba mtshan mchog brgyan pa kye/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu tshang ba kye/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus lus brgyan kye/ /srid pa'i mtsho rgal spros med tshur spyon kye/ /srid pa'i btson

rar chud khrol bzhengs shig kye/ /ye shes mchog rig tshangs pa 'dra ba kye/ /me tog zla ba thugs rje chen po kye/ /byams dang snying rje skyed la bzhengs shig kye/ /me tog zla ba khyod la gsol ba 'debs/ /dge slong dge 'dun khyod kyis

ma dor bar/ /tshur gshegs dge 'dun yongs su bsdu ba mdzod/ /bzhengs la nags khrod der yang gshegs sam kye/ /me tog zla ba bsam gtan dgyes pa mchog /mdza' dang mi mdza' mtshungs par byams shing phan/ /

gzungs la rab tu gnas pa tshur spyon kye/ /ye shes sdong po mtshungs med khyod bzhengs shig /ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo brtan pa kye/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sems can mnyam yid kye/ /me tog zla ba brtul zhugs rdzogs pa kye/ /

bzhengs la shing gi drung du 'tshang rgya mdzod/ /lha yi rna ba chos kyi mchog 'chang kye/ /lha yi mig mkhas ye shes rtogs pa kye/ /bzhengs te bdag la gzigs shig thugs rje can/ /grags pa mtha' yas bdag gi tshig gson

kye/ /'jig rten kun la phan dang don mdzad kye/ /me tog zla ba shin du sbyin dgyes kye/ /bzhengs la myur du bdag gi re rdzogs mdzod/ /khyod 'dir dum bu dum bur ma bzhugs shig /grong 'dir skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams kyang / /

khyod mthong thams cad shing bzhin sa la 'gyel/ /snying skabs 'gyur ba'i mya ngan rnams kyang bgyid/ /thugs rje mchog gi spyan gyis de la gzigs/ /gang gi slad du byams pa bsgoms pa dang / /ye shes shes rab thabs

kyi stobs rnams dang / /khyod kyi thugs rje btang snyoms dga' ba yangs/ /de dag rdzogs mdzod bzhengs shig me tog mdzes/ /lha klu lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / /gnod sbyin srin po mi dang mi 'am ci/ /snyim pa me tog bdug

pas bkang nas ni/ /thams cad mthong bar dga' nas lhags shing 'khod/ /drang srong chen po'i tshig ni deng rtogs te/ /skye dgu'i 'dod pa gnod byed gsod pa yin/ /yid kyi nad du 'gyur ba ngan 'gro'i rgyu/ /de phyir 'dod pa'i spyod pa

spang bar bya/ /dge slong bdag gis bsad pa sdig gi las/ /shin du ma legs mi bde byas pas na/ /bdag ni mi bzad dmyal ba mnar med 'gro/ /bdag la de yi mgon skyabs byed pa med/ /bdag ni rgyal po'i srid btang

tshangs spyod gzhol/ /spos dang me tog byug pa rnams kyis ni/ /mchod pa dam pa rnams kyang rab tu bya/ /shin du mdzes par mchod rten bdag gis bya/ /bu dang bu mo bud med khyim bdag dang / /blon po dang ni tshong dpon de dag dang / /grong ba

dang ni rgyal rigs mang po rnams/ /de dag thams cad la ni ngas bsgo ba/ /a ga ru dang tsan dan shug pa dang / /shin du zhim pa'i spos mchog ci yod pas/ /myur du sgrom gyi snying po'i khyogs chos la/ /dge slong 'di ni bsreg pa'i cho

ga gyis/ /grong khyer mi kun rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /spos mchog dag kyang thogs nas khyogs bcas te/ /spos rab bzang po yid du 'ong las byas/ /der ni dge slong der yang bcug nas su/ /a ga ru dang tsan dan tsam pa ka /rgya

spos spri ka de bzhin pa ta la/ /me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dag /shin du bzang dang 'bru mar dag gis bsregs/ /de yi rus pa'i sgrom ni byas par gyur/ /dge slong dag gis de yang der bsregs te/ /rgyal pos de yi mchod rten byas nas

su/ /'di la ngas ni mchod pa bya zhes zer/ /me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dang / /gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan thogs nas su/ /rgyal pos der ni sil snyan stong dag dang / /bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyang len du btsud/ /nyi ma gcig la

rgyal po dus gsum du/ /dge slong de yi mchod rten de drung du/ /sdig pa sngan cad cung zad ci byas pa/ /de tshe dus gsum du yang shin du 'chags/ /lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar/ /nyes pa byas pa dag kyang rab bshags te/ /phyis kyang tshul

khrims dam pa ma ral bsrungs/ /rnam par dag cing gtsang la dri ma med/ /lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar/ /gso sbyong dag kyang de tshe rab gsos te/ /de ni de tshe bdag gi lus zhig nas/ /mnar med mi bzad par ni de lhung gyur/ /

'dod phyir snying rje med pa'i las byas pas/ /sdug bsngal mang po dag kyang myong bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu lnga/ /de tshe de dag bdag gis ma mnyes byas/ /lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar/ /de yi tshe na nga ni long

bar gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig drug bcu gnyis/ /sngan chad nga yi mig kyang bcar bar gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong dang / /shin du mang bar nga yi mig phyung phrogs/ /mgo dang rna ba dang ni rkang lag kyang / /bskal

pa mtha' yas khrag khrig bcad par gyur/ /bskal pa dag ni bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /mir gyur pa dang skye ba gzhan du yang / /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis rab gtses shing / /sdug bsngal tshor ba yun ring myong bar gyur/ /sdig pa'i

las rnams byas pas 'khor ba na/ /yun ring shin du sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/ /de phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa/ /srid pa gsum du sdig pa mi bya'o/ /rgyal po mchog gis sngon gyi las bshags kyang / /snga ma'i nyes

byas rnams las de ma thar/ /mi bzad gzugs kyi las rnams sngar byas pas/ /de shi dmyal ba mi bzad mnar med song / /nga yi rna ba de bzhin rkang lag bcad/ /bskal pa mtha' yas mang por sna yang bcad/ /spyod pa spyod

tshe mtshon cha dbyug thogs nas/ /'debs byed nan gyis nga yi mig kyang phyung / /byang chub phyir ni mgo lag lus bcad dang / /bu dang chung ma mig dang rang gi sha /rkang lag dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs btang yang / /sngon gyi

sdig pa'i las ni zad ma gyur/ /kun dga' de ltar bskal pa mtha' yas spyod/ /sangs rgyas dpal stug dpag tu med pa mthong / /byang chub spyod mchog 'di ni spyod pa na/ /de tshe sdug bsngal 'di dag sngon myong gyur/ /byang chub

sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas shing / /byams spyod rtag tu mi g.yo mi 'gul ba/ /sangs rgyas rdul sbyangs lha yi lha mchod nas/ /de dag nam yang ngan song sar mi 'gro/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go bgos pa/ /

chos rje sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur su 'dod pa/ /tshul khrims ma 'dres g.yo ba med par srungs/ /gzungs la rab gnas chos kyang bstan par gyis/ /nga ni de tshe rgyal po dpas byin yin/ /nga yi bu rnams phyi dus chos skyong ba/ /

me tog zla mdzes pad ma bla ma yin/ /dga' byed de ni zhi ba'i rgyal bar gyur/ /'jig rten gsum dpa' 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rkang gnyis gtso bor gyur/ /skye dgu dag gi don chen mdzad nas ni/ /mar me bzhin

du 'dren pa mya ngan 'das/ /bud med tshogs dang rgyal rigs mang po dang / /khyim bdag dang ni blon po stobs chen dang / /tshong dpon de bzhin grong ba'i mkhar gyi rgyal/ /thams cad stobs bcu nyon mongs med par gyur/ /me tog zla

mdzes kyi le'u ste sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci nas bdag bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin

'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas mang du bsgom par bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher

yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi phung po la yang rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims

tshogs gnas shing / /bdag la phan sems spyad pa gang spyod pa/ /mngon dga'i sangs rgyas zhing du myur song nas/ /bzod pa des thob chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /de phyir gnod sems med cing kun 'thun gyis/ /

thams cad rtag tu yid du 'ong bar bgyis/ /dpal stug sangs rgyas dpag med mthong nas ni/ /byang chub reg nas chos kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /de phyir phan yon mchog 'di thos nas ni/ /dge slong tshul khrims mchog dang

ldan mthong na/ /mkhas pas g.yo med rtag tu bsten par bya/ /ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin 'di 'thob 'gyur/ /gal te gter rnams dpag med tshad kyang med/ /rin chen sna bdun nor bus gang gyur pa/ /de bzhin

zhing rnams gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /nor bu rin po che yis gang ba rnams/ /byang chub sems dpa' sbyin la mos pa yis/ /nyin mtshan re rer sbyin pa 'di dag byin/ /de bzhin bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /rgyun mi 'chad

par sbyin pa byin pa bas/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting 'dzin 'di/ /thos nas bde gshegs mdzod mchog 'dzin byed pa/ /bsod nams phung po des ni gang bzung ba/ /sbyin pa de kun de yi char mi phod/ /mi gang

rjes su 'thun la dad pa dag /ting 'dzin rdul bral mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/ /bsod nams phung po dpe med mchog 'di yin/ /ye shes mdzod de dpag med 'byung gnas so/ /ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba 'di bzung na/ /byang chub

sems dpa' de ni nor chen 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du thos pa'i gter/ /de la bsod nams tshad yod yong mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi mchog rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /shin du rgyas byas byang chub sems dpar

brjod/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni su dag ston byed pa/ /de ni nam yang byang chub the tshom med/ /bsod nams phung po mchog dang gang ldan zhing / /gang la tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'jig rten slob dpon sangs rgyas rnam par

'dren/ /rang byung thugs rje chen po ma gtogs par/ /de yi 'og tu sems can su dag kyang / /stong chen 'di ni bsod nams phung po dang / /mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes kyis/ /mnyam par gyur pa nam yang yong

med do/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni thos nas 'dzin pa dang / /klog cing yongs su chub par byed pa dang / /mtshungs med sangs rgyas byang chub tshol ma gtogs/ /de yi ye shes mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bzung zhing

blags pa yis/ /bsod nams phung po ji snyed bsags pa yang / /gzhon nu ji ste chos de gzugs yod na/ /'jig rten khams mang 'dir yang shong mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang / /'das dang 'byung

ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'dod pa yis/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni gzung zhing bklag par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yin te/ /gzhon nu nga yi tshig la dad par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brdzun gyi

tshig mi gsung / /'di 'dra'i sems can brdzun du smra ba med/ /sngon gyi bskal pa brgya phrag bsam yas su/ /byang chub spyad pa mchog 'di rab spyod cing / /ting 'dzin 'di ni yongs su tshol ba'i phyir/ /ngas ni bdag tu lta ba 'dir sbyangs so/ /de phyir

chos kyi mdzod 'di mnyan par gyis/ /'di las mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig 'byung / /'di ni bsod nams phung po bsam yas yangs/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas ye shes myur du 'thob/ /mkhas pa 'jigs med de dag gang ston pa/ /'di ni mdo sde kun

gyi dam pa'i mdo/ /dge ba bsam gyis mi khyab 'byung gnas te/ /chos de rnams la mtha' thug rnyed mi 'gyur/ /stong chen dag ni bcad cing bshig nas su/ /rdul gyi tshogs rnams bgrang bar nus na yang / /mdo sde brgya phrag bsam yas tshad med

pa/ /rgyun mi chad par de stong bgrang mi nus/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi sems can thams cad kyi/ /phyi nang rgyu ba'i dbugs ni bgrang nus kyang / /ting 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang ston pa/ /mdo sde de dag mthar thug nus mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing

ni gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /'gro ba der yang sems can gang skyes pa/ /de dag sems ni bgrang bar nus kyang srid/ /rtag ston mdo sde de dag bgrang mi nus/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma ci yod dang / /klung dang mtshe'u dang gshong gi bye ma dag /bskal pa

bye ba dag gis bgrang nus kyang / /de dag 'chad pa'i mdo sde mtha' yas so/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang po na/ /chu yi phung po rtag 'dug ci yod pa/ /brgya tshal skra yi rtse mos bgrang nus kyang / /de yi dbyangs kyi yan lag kun mi 'grangs/ /

gang sngon 'dir ni sems can ci 'byung ba/ /rang gi lus la snying por 'dogs pa rnams/ /bskal pa bye ba mang pos bgrangs nus kyang / /de dag mdo sde sgrub pa shes mi nus/ /phyogs bcu dag na sems can ci yod pa/ /srog chags

kun gyi sgra skad bgrang nus kyang / /de dag rtag tu mi 'chad ston pa yi/ /mdo sde de dag bgrang bar yong mi nus/ /chos rnams thams cad bstan par rab shes shing / /nges pa'i tshig dang bstan pa tshig don mkhas/ /gtan la bab pa'i yang dag

tshul la bslabs/ /blo gros yangs shing rtag dga' shes rab can/ /yangs pa'i don sems rab tu phye ba'i blo/ /bsam dang mi bsam pa yang rtag tu shes/ /dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rgya chen thams cad rig /sgra dbyangs de dag ston kyang chags

mi 'gyur/ /thogs med de ni chos smrar brjod pa ste/ /'gro ba kun la ston kyang chags mi 'gyur/ /dra ba nges par bstan pa brgya la mkhas/ /de ltar de yis don dam rab tu rtogs/ /mdo sde gcig gis phyogs kyang bye ba snyed/ /bsam gyis mi

khyab des ston chags pa med/ /chags med ston pa tshig gi don la mkhas/ /'khor gyi nang du de 'chad chags mi 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin 'di la legs par gang gnas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni g.yo ba med/ /chos la stobs

bskyed bye brag thob pas ni/ /srog chags bye ba mang po'i don de byed/ /ji ltar ri rab mi g.yo mi 'gul te/ /rlung rnams kun gyis 'gul bar mi nus pa/ /de bzhin dge slong chos smra mkhas pa yang / /pha rol rgol ba kun gyis bskyod

mi nus/ /stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams 'di na/ /ri gang mi g.yo bar ni brjod pa rnams/ /de dag rlung gis rab tu bskyod nus kyang / /stong pa'i chos gnas dge slong bskyod mi nus/ /su dag stong pa nyid la rtag brtson pa/ /sangs rgyas

gnas su nges pa de yin te/ /gtan la bab pa stong pa'i chos rab shes/ /de ni rgol ba kun gyis dkrug mi nus/ /phas kyi rgol ba dag gis mi bskyod cing / /smra ba thams cad kyis kyang zil mi non/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni bstan byas

na/ /zil gyis mi non smad pa med par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni bshad byas na/ /de yis stong nyid rtogs par khong du chud/ /de ni chos rnams kun la nem nur med/ /ye shes mtha' yas dag la khor mor gnas/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni bzung

zhing blags pa na/ /stobs dang byang chub yan lag rnyed mi dka'/ /yang dag rig dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /de la mngon par shes pa rnyed mi dka'/ /mtha' yas ye shes rgyal ba mthong ba yang / /srid par grub pa dag ni rnyed mi dka'/ /

sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab/ /ting 'dzin 'di 'chang de yis mthong bar 'gyur/ /de ni rgyal ba de dag thams cad las/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang thos 'gyur te/ /yang dag rig dang dbang gi pha rol phyin/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog

dang ldan par 'gyur/ /stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams 'di dag /lha rdzas nor bu rin chen bzang mchog gis/ /'og nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/ /nor bu rin chen dag gis gang gyur dang / /zhing yang mtha' yas rnam mang ji snyed pa/ /

'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser bkram gang ba kun/ /sa yi 'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i mchog la sbyin pa byin/ /sems can rnam pa mang po ji snyed pa/ /bskal pa mtha' yas mang por sbyin pa byin/ /sangs rgyas rnams la

khor mor mi chad byin/ /byang chub 'dod phyir byin pa'i sbyin tshogs la/ /dge slong gang dag stong nyid mngon dga' zhing / /stobs bcu la ni thal sbyar phyag 'tshal na/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid mngon dga' la/ /sbyin pa'i phung po snga mas

char mi 'phod/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i mi des de rnyed nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs med tshol ba'i phyir/ /dad pa rgya cher bskyed nas sbyin pa byin/ /de yi dpe 'di skyes bu dam pas bstan/ /su dag ting 'dzin dam pa'i mchog 'di

las/ /tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad sems dga' 'dzin pa yang / /de yi bsod nams phung po bsags pa la/ /sbyin pa de kun brgya yi char mi phod/ /ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba ma thos par/ /phan byed byang chub sems dpas sbyin byin kyang / /

thos pas sangs rgyas ye shes myur thob ltar/ /de tsam sangs rgyas ye shes myur mi 'thob/ /gang gis zhing mchog sa 'di thob nas su/ /rdul bral ting 'dzin stong pa'i rigs 'di ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas rtogs byed

pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas ye shes myur du 'thob/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi gter rnyed pa/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /de dag lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyi/ /nor bu rin po che yis gang bar gyur/ /byang chub sems

dpas ting 'dzin 'di thob ste/ /rtag tu chub par byed cing mi ngoms pa/ /thul bar dka' zhing mdzod rnams shin du mang / /nor yang mang zhing rin chen nor dang ldan/ /ji ltar ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di thob nas/ /byang chub sems dpa'

dga' zhing rangs pa ltar/ /rgyal srid shin du 'byor cing rgyas thob kyang / /mkhas pa de dag nam yang dgar mi 'gyur/ /de dang de dag sangs rgyas kun mkhyen gyi/ /chos rnams rtag tu 'dzin par byed pa yin/ /zad pa'i mthar thug dus su

gyur pa'i tshe/ /chos kyi tshul mchog rgya cher 'dzin par 'gyur/ /chos kyi mdzod 'chang blo gros chen po 'chang / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyang 'chang ba yin/ /de dang de dag sems can bye mang dang / /khrag khrig chos kyi dbyangs kyis

mgu bar byed/ /de dag tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros can/ /skyes bu de dag bslabs pa'i nor gyis phyug /de dang de dag tshul khrims brtul zhugs gnas/ /mngon dga' chos kyi sdong po'i myu gu yin/ /de dag chos gos ngur smrig

rin chen 'chang / /khyim nas 'byung la rtag tu dga' bar byed/ /de dag sems can phan phyir mnyam pa med/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu zhugs/ /de dag dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul/ /rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su

ldan/ /de dag dul zhing rab dul rjes su song / /zhi ba'i dbang po rab tu zhi ba yin/ /de dag sems can nyal ba gnyid log pa/ /rtag tu chos kyi skad kyis sad par byed/ /sems can dag ni sad par byas nas su/ /rin chen chos

bzang mchog la 'god par byed/ /de dang de dag sbyin pa'i bdag po yin/ /khor mor rtag tu gtong la brkyang ba ste/ /mkhas pa de dag 'jungs dang 'grogs mi byed/ /gtong ba chen po dag la rtag tu dga'/ /de dag sems can dbul

zhing sdug bsngal rnams/ /mthong nas longs spyod kyis kyang tshim par byed/ /de dag sems can bde zhing phan pa'i phyir/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtag par zhugs/ /de dag ye shes rtag tu bslabs pa ste/ /chos kyi rnga yang

rgya cher shin du rdung / /skye bo kun gyi the tshom 'khri shing gcod/ /rtag par ye shes la yang rab tu zhugs/ /de dag legs thos chos 'dzin rdul bral ba/ /'khor gyi nang du stan la 'dug nas su/ /mkhas pa blo gros 'chang ba de dag

ni/ /mdo sde bye ba brgya dag rab tu ston/ /de dang de dag mang du thos pa yin/ /thos pa 'dzin pa sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin/ /chos kyi mdzod rnams shin du 'dzin byed de/ /thub pa'i chos kyi gter la dga' ba yin/ /de dang de

dag shes rab yangs pa yin/ /dga' ba dag kyang rgya cher rtag tu skyed/ /zhib cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba blta dka' ba/ /zhi ba'i chos mchog rnams kyang rab tu ston/ /de dag chos dang chos min shes pa ste/ /des shing blo gros ldan

pa chos la gnas/ /chos kyi rgyal srid rab tu ston byed cing / /mtshungs med chos kyi mchog la rtag tu spyod/ /de dag chos kyi mchog la lhur byed de/ /bla ma la yang ri mo byed par gnas/ /chos kyi grong khyer mchog la gnas

pa ste/ /blo gros ldan pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng / /de dag dregs shing rgyags pa'i sems can rnams/ /rtag tu bag med pa la gnas pa mthong / /rab tu ma rung log pa'i lam song zhing / /'khor ba'i lam la gnas pa mthong

nas ni/ /de la byams dang snying rje rgya cher bskyed/ /dga' dang btang snyoms dag la'ang rab gnas te/ /de dag la ni yan lag brgyad ldan pa/ /lam mchog zhi ba blta dka' rab tu ston/ /de dang de dag legs byas chos kyi gru/ /

bshams nas 'khor ba'i rgyun du song ba dag /rgya mtsho chen por lhung zhing khyer ba yi/ /sems can mang po dag ni sgrol bar byed/ /byang chub yan lag stobs dang dbang po yis/ /go bgos dam pa'i chos kyi gru zhugs nas/ /pha rol

'gram bde rtag tu 'jigs med par/ /khor mor sems can rnams kyang 'god par byed/ /de dag sman pa'i gtso bo dka' thub la/ /shin du spyad pa rig byed sman pa'i mchog /rig pa ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi yang sbyin

par byed/ /nad ni rnam pa mang pos btab pa yi/ /sems can na ba dag kyang mthong nas su/ /de dag la ni chos kyi bkru sman gtong / /chos rnams kyis ni de dag gso ba byed/ /de dag smra ba pha rol rgol ba 'joms/ /'jig rten dbang po tshig gi

dbang phyug ldan/ /shes bya kun la 'od byed blo gros 'chang / /ye shes dam pa'i sa la rab tu gnas/ /dpa' bo ye shes stobs ldan stobs 'joms pa/ /ye shes ldan pa dag gis yang dag bsngags/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag /

chos la gnas nas shes pas mgu bar byed/ /de dang de dag bdag po ded dpon te/ /gsal ba sems can rnams kyi skyabs 'dod pa/ /sems can rin chen lam la rmongs gyur cing / /rtag tu bdud kyi snying zhugs mthong nas ni/ /de dag la

yang lam mchog zhi zhing bde/ /rtag par mya ngan 'das pa rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa dag ni ye shes lam de yis/ /sems can mang po bye brgya 'dren par byed/ /de dang de dag gnas dang rten du 'gyur/ /skyabs dang mig dang sgron ma byed pa yin/ /

'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs rab tu sbyin/ /skrag pa rnams kyang rtag tu dbugs 'byin byed/ /de dag sems can shin du sdug bsngal dang / /dmus long gyur pa 'di dag rig nas ni/ /yang dag tshul bslabs rin chen chos rnams

kyis/ /chos kyi snang ba dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ /'jig rten na ni bzo mchog ci yod pa/ /bzo bo byed pas sems can phan 'gyur zhing / /gang gis sems can rtag tu bder 'gyur ba/ /bzo yi rnam pa de dag shin du bslabs/ /

su dag byang chub tu ni mngon zhugs te/ /blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten mig sbyin pa/ /bslabs pa rnams la mchog gi pha rol phyin/ /mkhas rab 'jig rten na yang ngo mtshar thob/ /sangs rgyas dag gi chos mchog thos pa yis/ /mtshungs

pa med pa ngoms par yong mi 'gyur/ /tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin pha rol phyin/ /zab mo yi ni chos rnams shin du thos/ /de dag zhi ba rin chen chos rnams ni/ /gzhan la ston pas ngoms par mi 'gyur te/ /thar ba'i thabs kyi char

yang rab 'bebs shing / /chos kyis skyes bu dag ni tshim par byed/ /de yi drung du sems can mang po ni/ /chos 'dod mkhas pa ji snyed lhags nas su/ /chos mchog bzang po dam pa rin po che/ /drang zhing gsal ba'i lam rnams mnyan

snyam pa/ /de dag blo gros 'chang bas the tshom bcad/ /chos kyis de dag shin du mgu bar byed/ /tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin pho rol phyin/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rab tu shes/ /ye shes ldan zhing ye shes mchog

rab kyi/ /pha rol phyin pa sems can bsam la mkhas/ /sems can pha rol sems dang spyod pa dang / /gang dag gtam ni ci 'dra'i chos brjod pa/ /ye shes gtam ni brjod la gang dag gis/ /sems can khrag khrig chos mchog

mig thob 'gyur/ /de dag ye shes bye brag pha rol phyin/ /lam rnams kyang ni nye bar ston par byed/ /mkhas pa de dag gi ni sems rnams kyang / /bdud rnams bye ba stong gis yong mi shes/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la ni bya song ba/ /

de yi rjes ni gang du'ang shes mi nus/ /ye shes stobs ldan dul zhing rab tu zhi/ /zhi ba 'phags pa'i ye shes dag la gnas/ /dpa' bo khyu mchog bdud rnams thams cad bcom/ /byang chub zhi ba mngon par 'tshang yang rgya/ /

rtag tu rdzu 'phrul dag gi pha rol phyin/ /zhing yang brgya phrag mang por 'gro bar byed/ /sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig mthong / /ji bzhin gang gA yi ni bye ma snyed/ /de yi mig kyang thogs par mi 'gyur te/ /phyogs bcu dag

gi gzugs mang mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji snyed phyogs bcu yi ni srid pa na/ /sems can yod dgu de dag 'dren par gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag mang por ni/ /de dag de yi phan yon kun brjod cing / /spobs pa yi ni

rab tu bshad mdzad kyang / /sngon gyi spyod pa'i bsngags pa zad mi nus/ /ting 'dzin mtshungs med rdul dang bral ba 'di/ /skyes bu su gang 'dzin par byed pa ni/ /sangs rgyas dag gi nor rnams mi zad de/ /shin du rgya che ye shes

rgya mtsho bzhin/ /tshul khrims kyi phung po nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag dang / gzhan yang tshad med pa 'dod pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs

par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod

cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med par bsgom pas bsgom par bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya/ des bzod pa'i stobs bsgom par bya/ bzod pa bsten par bya/ mang du bya/ chos la don du gnyer

ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos dang rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /des gnas gsum la brtson par bya ste/

gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa zad pa dang / bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba la reg par 'dod pa'i phyir ni ma

yin te/ gnas gsum po de dag la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di dag tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs

kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /bskal pa stong du ji ltar ngas spyad pa/ /gzhon nur gyur pa nga las mnyan par gyis/ /ting 'dzin bzang po dam pa 'di tshol phyir/ /sangs rgyas dag ni stong phrag brgya yang mchod/ /de ltar

bskal pa 'das pa bsam yas su/ /zhing brgya yi ni bye ma ci yod pa/ /dper bsten de snyed 'das par gyur pa na/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung / /bye ba stong phrag drug cu mi nyung ba/ /rgyal ba de yi tshogs ni byung
gyur te/ /thams cad zag pa med cing nyon mongs zad/ /rnam thar brgyad la gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa/ /de yi dus na sa 'di thams cad kyang / /bde zhing lo legs 'khrug pa med par gyur/ /mi rnams thams cad

skyid cing bde dang ldan/ /mi yi bde ba dag gis rgyas par gyur/ /thams cad bsod nams stobs dang ldan pa ste/ /blta na sdug cing de bzhin dga' bar gyur/ /thams cad phyug cing nor mang 'byor ba ste/ /lus ni lha

yi bde dang ldan par gyur/ /des shing brtul zhugs bzang la nyon mongs chung / /bzod pa'i stobs la dpa' zhing byad gzugs bzang / /lha yi gnas na lha yi sras po bzhin/ /tshul khrims yon tan 'chang zhing

blo gros ldan/ /de yi dus na sa bdag byung ba ni/ /rgyal po me tog mchog ces bya ba yin/ /de yi bu yang lnga brgyar tshang bar byung / /dran dang ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan par gyur/ /rgyal po'i bu de yis kyang rgyal ba
yi/ /bskyed mos tshal brgya stong phrag drug bcu dag /thams cad me tog 'bras bus brgyan pa yang / /thugs rje ldan pa de la rab tu phul/ /bskyed mos tshal ni brgya stong sna tshogs dag /'chag sa mal

stan bzhugs gnas stong rnams dang / /chos gos kyang ni bye ba brgya stong gis/ /'chag sa bzhugs gnas rnams su gding ba byas/ /de ltar rnam pa du ma stong dag dang / /dge sbyong dag gi longs spyod ji snyed pa/ /rgyal ba'i bu ni

shin du yid dad pas/ /bde gshegs de la thams cad nye bar phul/ /rgyal po de yang dge ba'i las bcu yi/ /lam la rab tu gnas par gyur nas su/ /skye bo srog chags khrag khrig brgya stong gis/ /mdun du bdar te 'dren pa lta bar

song / /me tog dang ni byug pa bdug pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sil snyan thogs nas su/ /rgyal ba de la de yis mchod byas te/ /thal mo sbyar nas spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/ /lha dang mi dang lha min gnod sbyin dang / /dge slong stong yang

de tshe dga' bar gyur/ /rgyal ba mchod pa 'di ni lung ston tam/ /mi yi dbang po legs par chos gsung ngam/ /rgyal po'i bu de yi ni bsam pa dang / /bla med sems kyang rang byung mkhyen nas ni/ /mos pa'i gnas la pha rol phyin pa yis/ /de

la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad do/ /gang tshe bde bar gshegs pas gsung phyung ba/ /de tshe nags tshal bcas pa'i sa yang g.yos/ /nam mkha' las ni me tog char kyang bab/ /sa las pad ma brgya dag byung bar gyur/ /ston pa don gyi tshig la rab bslabs

pas/ /bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dren pas lung bstan te/ /mi yi dbang pos ting 'dzin zhi ba bshad/ /de yi don tshig rnams kyang mnyan par gyis/ /srid pa thams cad srid pa med pa ste/ /kun brtags gsog dang smig rgyu 'dra ba yin/ /sgyu ma

ji bzhin glog dang sprin 'dra ste/ /stong g.yo bdag dang sems can srog kun med/ /gzod ma nas ni stong zhing ma 'ongs chos/ /song ba med cing gnas med gnas kyis dben/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtag tu snying po med/ /thams cad dag cing rnam

dag nam mkha' bzhin/ /mi sngo mi ser dkar po ma yin te/ /ming ni gsog gyur sgra yi rang bzhin yin/ /sems ni dben zhing sems med rang bzhin te/ /skad cig yin pas thams cad sgra dang bral/ /bshad pa na yang yi ge 'pho ba med/ /ma bshad

na yang yi ge 'grib mi 'gyur/ /yi ge dag ni phyogs su'ang mi 'gro ste/ /yi ge gang nas kyang ni 'ongs ma yin/ /yi ge mi zad zad cing 'gags pa ste/ /bshad par byas sam bshad par ma byas kyang / /yi ge 'di dag rtag par mi zad

brjod/ /gang gis yongs shes de yang zad mi 'gyur/ /chos ni stong phrag brgya dag rab brjod nas/ /sangs rgyas brgya stong dag ni gang 'das pa/ /chos kyang ma zad yi ge'ang zad ma gyur/ /skye ba yang med de phyir mi zad pa/ /gang gis

mi zad chos rnams rab shes pa/ /rtag tu mi zad pa yi chos shes pas/ /mdo sde brgya stong dag ni bshad byas kyang / /chos rnams thams cad yi ge med par shes/ /rgyal ba'i chos ni gang dag rab ston pa/ /de yang mi zad pas na mi mthong ste/ /

chos 'di snga nas bdag med sems can med/ /de dag rab tu ston kyang zad mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pa de ni tshig kun smra byed kyang / /tshig gis sems ni 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te/ /tshig rnams thams cad ri yi brag cha bzhin/ /de phyir nam yang

tshig la chags mi 'gyur/ /de ni sgyu ma'i tshig gis chos ston te/ /tshig de thams cad de yi mod la 'gags/ /tshig de yi ni mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba/ /chos rnams kun kyang mtshan nyid de 'drar gyur/ /chos kun mtshan gzhi med cing mtshan gzhi bral/ /

thams cad mtshan med mtshan nyid rnam par dag /rtag tu dben zhing gtsang ba nam mkha' bzhin/ /mdor na de dag bgrang bar nyer mi 'gyur/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas kun dben pa ste/ /drang srong de dag la ni rnam rtog med/ /'gro ba kun du 'dus ma

byas thob pas/ /lta ba dag las khor mor rnam par dben/ /gang dag 'di 'dra'i chos rnams shes pa ni/ /rtag tu ma chags mi gtum ma rmongs te/ /de yi sems ni rang bzhin mnyam par bzhag /de ni ting 'dzin stobs can stobs dang ldan/ /

brag phug ri dang gcong rong klung rnams su/ /rkyen kyis ji ltar brag cha 'byung ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'dus byas 'di kun rig par gyis/ /'jig rten thams cad sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin/ /gang du ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/ /yon tan chos su gyur pa shes

rab stobs/ /drang srong ye shes stobs kyis mngon par shes/ /tshig ni thabs mkhas pa yi nges pa'i tshig /brtags pa tsam du brtags nas brjod pa yin/ /'khor ba la ni mtha' ma mi rnyed de/ /gang dag sngon byung mtha' ni

mtshan nyid med/ /ma 'ongs dus kyang shes par bya ba'i phyir/ /las dang bya bas de ltar zhugs gyur te/ /rab dang tha ma dag tu'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chos rnams rtag tu dben zhing rang bzhin stong / /thams cad bdag med par yang shes par

gyis/ /kun rdzob tu ni rgyal bas chos bshad de/ /'dus byas 'dus byas ma yin de ltar ltos/ /yang dag nyid du bdag dang mi med de/ /'gro ba kun gyi mtshan nyid de 'dra'o/ /dge dang nag po'i las rnams mi 'jig ste/ /bdag gis byas

pa dag ni myong bar 'gyur/ /las kyi 'bras bu 'pho bar mi 'gyur te/ /rgyu med par yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /srid pa thams cad sgyu ma dbang med pa/ /gsog dang gsob tu gyur pa dbu ba bzhin/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur rtag tu stong / /

sgra yis de bshad de dag dben pa yin/ /de ltar rnam par rig pa rlom sems med/ /tshul khrims la yang chags pa med pa'i sems/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis cung zad mi rtog ste/ /de ltar spyod pa mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur/ /rgyal

po des ni ji tsam chos rigs pa/ /de tsam du ni rgyal ba des bshad de/ /rgyal pos rgyal ba'i chos 'di thos nas ni/ /'khor dang bcas pas bslab pa yang dag bzung / /rgyal po'i bu des ting 'dzin 'di mnyan nas/ /dga' zhing yi rangs

tshig kyang 'di skad smra/ /shin du legs par ting 'dzin 'di bshad de/ /khyod kyi zhabs la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /der yang srog chags stong phrag brgyad bcu dag /yang dag don dam nges par bstan pa 'di/ /chos kyi rang bzhin bzang po

'di thos nas/ /de dag mi skye ba yi bzod pa thob/ /skyes bu la ni skye dang 'gag pa med/ /de bzhin chos 'di rtag tu snga nas dben/ /de ltar rab shes yongs su mi 'bri ste/ /rgyal pos mi skye bzod pa thob par gyur/ /de tshe rgyal pos rgyal

srid rnam spangs te/ /rgyal ba de yi bstan la rab tu byung / /rgyal po'i sras kyang lnga brgya mi nyung ba/ /de dag kun kyang rjes su rab tu byung / /rgyal po sras dang bcas pa rab byung nas/ /de tshe srog chags mang po stong gzhan yang / /bde bar

gshegs pa'i drung du rab tu byung / /rgyal ba de la chos rnams tshol bar byed/ /lo ni brgya phrag nyi shur yongs tshang bar/ /rgyal ba des ni chos rnams rab tu bshad/ /rgyal po bur bcas skye bor bcas pa yis/ /lo yang brgya phrag nyi shur

chos rnams spyad/ /de nas dus kyang gzhan du gyur pa'i tshe/ /rgyal ba de yang yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'das par gyur/ /de yi chos rnams kyang ni nyung bar gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po de yi bu yod pa/ /bsod nams blo

gros dad cing dang ba ste/ /de yi khyim du nyer 'gro dge slong yod/ /des ni ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang bshad/ /de ni 'jam zhing mnyen par gyur pa ste/ /srog chags brgya stong dag gis bkur sti byas/ /lha yang bye ba brgya dag phyir 'brang zhing / /grong du

'ongs nas bsngags pa rjod par byed/ /de ni dran dang ldan zhing rtogs par ldan/ /brtul zhugs bzang zhing des pa tshul khrims dga'/ /dbyangs kyang snyan cing mi rtsub 'jam pa ste/ /khams rnams shes pa'i dbang mchog rab tu thob/ /dge

slong de ni snyan pa'i 'od ces bya/ /chos gos bye ba brgya yang rab tu rnyed/ /de yi bsod nams stobs ni mi bzod pas/ /de tshe dge slong stong dag phrag dog skyes/ /bsod nams stobs dang gzugs kyi stobs rnams dang / /ye shes stobs dang rdzu

'phrul stobs rnams dang / /tshul khrims stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs rnams dang / /chos kyi stobs kyis dge slong yang dag 'phags/ /skye bo'i yid du 'ong zhing phangs pa ste/ /dge slong dge bsnyen dang ni dge slong ma/ /rgyal ba'i bstan

la sems can gang dad pa/ /de dag gis ni mchod cing bkur ba yin/ /rgyal po'i bu ni der yang gang byung ba/ /bsod nams blo gros rtag tu dad mos te/ /dge slong mang po yid 'khrug rig nas ni/ /slob dpon de la srung ba byed du btsud/ /srog

chags dag ni stong phrag lnga brgya rnams/ /go bgos mtshon cha ral gri dbyug thogs pa/ /de dag gis ni dge slong rtag tu bskor/ /yang dag spyod pa mu med 'chad cing smra/ /de ni 'khor la chos rnams rab ston te/ /chos

'di bdag med stong pa srog med 'chad/ /dmigs par lta ba bdag la chags pa rnams/ /de dag dge slong ci smra mos mi byed/ /su dag stong pa zhi ba mi 'dod pa/ /dge slong 'di ni chos min rab ston gyis/ /'di bsad na ni bsod

nams 'gyur zhes nas/ /dge slong dag ni lag na mtshon thogs 'ongs/ /mthong nas dge slong mtshon gyis mi 'jigs te/ /'di la sems can skyes bu gsod pa med/ /chos 'di rnams ni gsog ste rtsig pa 'dra/ /stong pa

nyid kyi chos rnams rjes su dran/ /dge slong des ni spyi bor thal sbyar te/ /tshig smras rgyal ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden pa gang gis chos 'di stong pa na/ /mtshon cha 'di rnams me tog mAn 'dAr gyur/ /thub pa tshul khrims

brtul zhugs ldan pa yis/ /gzhan du mi 'gyur tshig 'di smras ma thag /nags tshal bcas pa'i sa yang rab tu g.yos/ /mtshon cha de dag me tog mAn 'dAr gyur/ /dmigs pa can dag mtshon cha thogs pa yi/ /dge slong de tshe lus

ni zhum gyur nas/ /tshur yang de nas nye bar 'ong ma nus/ /skrag cing shin du ngo mtshar chen por gyur/ /su dag thub dbang la ni dad mos shing / /gang dag stong pa zhi ba 'dod pa rnams/ /de dag a la la stong brjod nas su/ /ras bcos brgya yis

dge slong mngon par g.yogs/ /dge slong de ni de la byams bskyed nas/ /sems can su dag nga la sdang byed pa/ /de dag phyir ni byang chub bdag spyod ces/ /skye bo thams cad kyi yang mdun du smra/ /des ni lo yang brgyad cu mi nyung bar/ /stong pa

rgyal ba rnams kyi mdzod bshad de/ /phyir rgol ba yang dge slong stong dag byung / /de dag rgyal po'i bu yis phyir bzlog byas/ /de yang de tshe yongs su brnyas gyur te/ /de yi dge slong dag kyang nyung bar gyur/ /de tshe mi snyan pa yi tshig thos kyang / /

bzod pa'i stobs las nam yang nyams ma gyur/ /de ni gzhan gyi dus su gyur pa'i tshe/ /srog chags brgya dag gi yang don chen byas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyang rjes su dran/ /bsod nams blo gros dga' ba chen po skyes/ /

der yang ri mo rgya cher byas nas ni/ /dge slong de la bsod nams blo gros smras/ /bdag gi slob dpon la ni su yis kyang / /sems la mi 'thad ci zhig ma bgyis sam/ /des smras rgyal sras gzhon nu gsan du gsol/ /bzod pa'i stobs

kyis sangs rgyas yang dag byung / /su yis bdag la mi snyan tshig smras pa/ /de la bdag ni byams pa rgya yang che/ /gang gis bskal pa stong phrag brgya dag tu/ /sngon gyi srid pa la ni bzod bsgoms pa/ /dge slong snyan 'od de ni nga yin zhes/ /
