pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa ste/ khyod 'di ltar sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje bar zhugs pas pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po chos gcig dang ldan na/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob cing ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems

can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas/ sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs

par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum pa thams cad la mi gnas pa yin te/ nang ngam phyi rol la gnas par mi byed do/ /de gnas pa med pas yang dag pa

mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa mthong bas yang dag pa la sbyor bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa la sbyor bas ci la yang blo thogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de blo thogs pa med pas yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod do/ /yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod pa

de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ chos gang yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin no/ /chos thams cad ni rkyen las 'byung ba ste/ rkyen med par 'byung ba'i chos ni gang yang med do/ /chos gang rten

cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ni ma skyes pa'o/ /de ltar na chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa ste/ chos thams cad ma skyes par rtogs par gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa rtogs pa 'thob bo/ /'di ltar sems can thams

cad la phan pa'i dngos po dang / snying rje'i sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /de de ltar mos pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad ni yongs su brtags pas sprul pa ste/ yongs su brtags

pa de yang shin du stong pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong par rtogs pa de ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon

par sprul nas sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan

'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa gang la la dag 'khor 'dir

'dus pa lta mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'khor 'di na bsams bzhin du go cha bgos pa gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa skyes bu dam pa drug bcu yod de/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa drug bcu po dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis

'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa lags sam/ 'on te 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na yang gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag kyang mchis/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub kyi phyogs cha logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob ces bya ba dang gnyis ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin te/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po gang gzhan dag nub bdun du 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa de dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mang du mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs

rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sgrim mi 'tshal bar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ji skad zer ba de de bzhin te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dag ni tshad med grangs med do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji lta bu'i sems kyi mtshan ma bstan

pas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de yang

'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa legs par mdzad du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mchis na/

byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba'i lan thos pas/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de yang mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag /bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang / der skyes ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi

khams 'di gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ ri'i tshogs dang shing ljon pa dang ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri btang gzung dang btang gzung chen po dang khor

yug dang khor yug chen po gang dag yod pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba des khyab par gyur to/ /nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/

'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag kyang mig gi dbang po la snang bar ma gyur to/ /nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong las thal nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de thams cad gser gyi kha dog gi snang

ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas 'od de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan

'das de'i spyan sngar mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi

mjed 'dir mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bltas pa de yang mthong ste/ dper na

skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa ltar mthong nas/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya cher skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag

'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gang dag 'dus pa dge slong dang dge slong ma dang

dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang /

byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor

cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ ri'i rgyal po bzhin du 'bar ba de dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang sa ler mthong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pas/ mdom gang tsam gyi

phyogs na skyes bu gcig shos kyi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sgrim mi dgos par mthong ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa mthong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas gang ba yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa de yang snang ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyes te/

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par bstan par mdzad pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sngon

sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang nyan thos chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong nas/

ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes kyang brjod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i tshe/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig

rten gyi khams de rnam pa drug tu 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs

rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po mthu chen thob/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhe sa dang
bcas par phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /skyes bu dam pa de gnyis phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de mthu brtan pa brnyes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i mtshan brjod pa tsam gyis sems pa ma mchis pa'i dog sa 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa'i snyad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag

med kyis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i mtshan

brjod par ma zad kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du ma dag na yang bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan yongs su rjod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang 'od des reg pas rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /sangs rgyas

kyi zhing de dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog

par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos so/ /thos nas kyang de dag thams cad 'dus

nas mgrin gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par lung
bstan to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i 'od 'di btang ba rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis

par ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'di ltar yid du mchi ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi gtong na gang gi slad du bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des 'di ltar yid du mchi ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od bkye ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis skyes bu dam

pa de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ rgyu med rkyen med par bcom ldan 'das des 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi bkye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de deng byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir bcom ldan

'das shAkya thub pa des chos bstan pa de'i snga ltas su 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od 'di bkye'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de la byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi

mjed der mchi'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de khyod nyid las brtsams te/ chos ston par 'gyur gyis de'i dus la dbab par shes pa/ khyed deng shig ces skabs phye bas

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i nyen 'khor

na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po rnams la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog /khyed kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub

pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na yod pa spangs nas/ smon lam dang thugs rje chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can der byung ste/

sems can dman pa la mos pa 'dod chags kyi shas che ba/ zhe sdang gi shas che ba/ gti mug gi shas che ba rnams kyi nang du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni dka' ba

mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis/ tshig 'di smras ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas/ mgrin gcig tu tshig

smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag gis sha'i mig gis de mngon sum

du mthong la mthong nas kyang dad pa rnyed pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta

ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed de'i dus la dbab par shes

na deng shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis yongs

su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nas dong ngo / /de nas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po de

dag thams cad re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi sprul pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas so/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang gru bzhi lham pa ka ba bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam par

legs par rnam par phye ba legs par zin pa sha stag go/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re re yang 'phang du ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ rgyar ni dpag tshad brgyad do/ /khang pa brtsegs pa dag gser las byas pa dag kyang yod/ dngul las

byas pa dag kyang yod/ bai dUr+ya las byas pa dag kyang yod/ shel las byas pa dag kyang yod/ mu tig dmar po dang rdo'i snying po dang / spug las byas pa dag kyang yod do/ /rin po che gser dang dngul dang sna gnyis pa dag kyang yod/

rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang sna gsum pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang sna bzhi pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang mu tig dmar po dang sna lnga pa'i khang

pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang mu tig dmar po dang spug dang sna drug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang mu tig dmar po dang

spug dang rdo'i snying po dang sna bdun pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa dag kyang yod/ a ka ru dang tsan dan las byas

pa dag kyang yod/ a ga ru nag po dang tsan dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/ tsan dan thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs

pa dag kyang yod/ sna ma'i me tog dang bar sha ka dang tsam pa ka dang / skya snar dang a ti mug ta ka dang ta ra ni dang go ta ra ni las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog da nu ska ri las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/

me tog mAn dA ra dang mAn dA ra chen po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog pa ru sha ka dang pa ru sha ka chen po dang many+dzu Sha ka dang many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang mdog mdzes chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang 'khor

lo chen po dang kun du 'khor lo dang / shin du mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang me tog zla ba dang zla ba chen po dang / shin du mdzes pa'i zla ba dang zla ba mchog dang / s+tha la dang s+tha la chen po dang / shin du mdzes pa'i s+tha la las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa

dag kyang yod/ me tog thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ kha dog du ma pa kha dog sna tshogs kha dog brgya stong du ma pa dkra ba/ lta na sdug pa yongs su dag pa/ 'od gsal ba dag kyang yod do/ /khang pa brtsegs

pa re rer yang lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul te/ de na lha'i bu mo kha cig gi lag na dung dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang khar rnga dang pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang / glu dbyangs sgra snyan pa dang gling bu dang rgyud can pi bang dang pi bang rgyud gsum

pa rnams thogs te/ sil snyan dang glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra skad rnam pa mang po de lta bu len cing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan dan sbrul gyi

snying po'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru dang tsan dan gyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru nag po dang tsan dan gyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo

kha cig ni tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po'i me tog gi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog mAn dA ra dang mAn

dA ra chen po dang pa ru sha ka dang pa ru sha ka chen po dang many+dzu Sha ka dang mAny+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / me tog mdog mdzes dang mdog mdzes chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang 'khor lo chen po dang / kun du 'khor lo dang shin du mdzes pa'i 'khor

lo dang / me tog zla ba dang zla ba chen po dang / shin du mdzes pa'i zla ba dang zla ba mchog dang / s+tha la dang s+tha la chen po dang shin du mdzes pa'i s+tha la'i me tog gi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog thams cad dang

bdug pa dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa'i de

bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang mu tig dkar po dang mu tig dmar po dang mu tig mthon ka'i mu tig gi phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang lha'i

ras bcos bu'i rgyal mtshan gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang spos kyi phur ma brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa

re rer yang gdugs kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog brgya stong du ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ legs par las su byas pa/ dbyibs shin du legs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs

pa re rer yang shing ta la'i phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba gang dag rlung

gis bskyod pa na 'di lta bu'i sgra dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i sil snyan yan lag bye ba brgya stong dang ldan pa mkhas pa dag gis legs par blangs nas sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod

na sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rdzing bu gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ bai dUr+ya dang shel gyis spras pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ me tog

ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar pos gang ba/ ngur pa sgra 'byin pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ bya rog gis btung du rung bar mu dang kha da chad du gang ba dag sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin

po che'i shing ljon pa'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor to/ /rin po che'i skud pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kun nas dkris so/ /rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa re re'i 'od kyis kyang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du snang bar gyur to/ /

de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa dag so sor byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa ji snyed yod pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na bkod pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad khang pa brtsegs pa re rer mngon par sprul to/ /snga ma

bzhin du sbyar te/ khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang de ltar bkod pa rnams mngon par sprul nas/ bkod pa de lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i

lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to/ /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/ /

byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas/ yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pas shin du lhag ge'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi 'od kyis kyang /

stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa

ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig

tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /gzi brjid mtshungs med yon tan

phung po gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong chen po kun mkhyen yon tan kun gyi pha rol gshegs/ /thams cad zil gnon srid pa gsum gyi chags pa'i lam las 'das/ /shAkya khyu mchog dri bral zla ba'i zhal la phyag

'tshal lo/ /nyi ma dri med lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa rnam par mdzes/ /mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis dag gi go cha banabs gyur cing / /dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa 'jig rten kun du gsal/ /mi mchog khyod mtshungs

'jig rten gsum na gang yang yod ma mchis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sku yi 'od kyis gang tshe reg gyur pa/ /de tshe 'jig rten nyi ma zla ba nor bu zhugs rnams dang / /brgya byin tshangs pa lha dang de bzhin mi ci rnams kyi 'od/ /

snag tsha'i phung po bzhin du mog mog mi snang gsal ma mchis/ /rgyal ba zhing gcig na ni yang dag bzhugs par gda' bzhin du/ /'gro ba'i don du skad cig gcig gis mtha' yas zhing du gshegs/ /ston pa'i bzhud

dang byon pa 'tshal ba su yang yod ma mchis/ /mdzad pa dag dang 'dul ba sna tshogs dag gis sems can 'dul/ /spu yi khung gcig nang du mtha' yas zhing rnams ston mdzad kyang / /'phel ba dang ni bri bar gyur pa gang yang yod ma

mchis/ /'di ni ji bzhin las dang byed pa rgyu dang 'bras gda' la/ /sems can rnams la gnod pa ma mchis 'dres par gyur ma mchis/ /gang na sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dags ma mchis shing / /rgyal ba'i sras po grags

pa chen po dag gis yongs gang la/ /mi khom brgyad po dag dang bral te mchog tu nyams dga' ba'i/ /yongs dag zhing de dag kyang mi mchog la lar ston pa mdzad/ /lha mi gang dag mi 'jigs bag ma mchis pa bkang slad du/

sems dmyal dud 'gro yi dags 'gro ba shin du mi bzad pa'i/ /kun nas nyon mongs zhing rnams la la dag kyang bstan mdzad nas/ /de dag thams cad bde bar gshegs la skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /zhing gzhan la la dag kyang nam

mkha' lta bur ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin gzhan yang zhugs kyis gtam zhing me lce 'khrugs pa dang / /zhing gzhan dag kyang chabs kyis yongs su gtams par ston pa mdzad/ /rnam 'phrul 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul

lags so/ /'dul ba'i don du gzugs kyi rnam pa mtha' yas ston mdzad pa/ /la lar 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'od chags gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i bdag po mchog tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnyed pa dang / /sum bcu

rtsa gsum dbang phyug mig stong rdo rje 'bar ba dang / /srog chags brgya phrag mang po rab tu dga' bas mchod bgyid cing / /dge ba bcu po dag gis sems can mtha' yas 'dul bgyid pa/ /blon po tshong dpon dag dang bka' la gtogs

pa'i gtsor gyur cing / /shin du 'jigs med dgra tshogs phab nas chad pas mi gcod la/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pos sems can rnams ni sdud bgyid cing / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la sems can rab tu 'jog

bgyid pa/ /bsod nams las kyis rin chen bdun dang ldan par gyur pa yi/ /gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba dag tu gyur/ /'jig rten 'di na la lar bltam pa lta bur ston mdzad de/ /dog sa la ni gom pa bdun dag bor zhing gshegs

nas kyang / /nga ni skyes nas skye dang 'chi ba'i tha mar dbyung ngo zhes/ /yid 'ong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung mchog brjod pa mdzad/ /mar me mdzad pa tshun chad dri ma thams cad spang lags kyang / /'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye

shes mchog la yongs smin mdzad slad du/ /la lar sems can dag pa btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs par gda'/ /mi yi dbang po btsun mo dag dang sras kyang ston pa mdzad/ /yab yum dag dang gnyen gyi rtsa lag sdug pa'i 'khor

rnams dang / /yul 'khor 'byor dang rin chen gter mdzod mang po btang mdzad nas/ /brgya byin tshangs pa dag dang lha min rnams kyis phyag bgyis shing / /drang srong chen po mngon par byung ste nags na bzhugs par gda'/ /'gro la sman slad

dgung lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas ni/ /bsam gtan mkha' khyab rin chen mchog la bsam gtan mdzad par gda'/ /mu stegs can gyi tshogs rnams thams cad tshar gcad mdzad slad du/ /sems can dag pa byang chub shing drung du yang

gshegs par gda'/ /'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu yongs smin mdzad slad du/ /mi dbang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin mchog la bzhugs mdzad nas/ /sku yi tshul ni gang gis 'jig rten rnam par 'dul 'gyur ba/ /rgyal ba de 'dra

nyid kyi sku yi cha lugs 'dzin par mdzad/ /ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'gro ba rmongs par bgyi slad du/ /sgyu ma mang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston bgyid pa/ /de bzhin 'gro ba sgron mas sems can 'dul bar mdzad slad du/ /sangs rgyas

nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mang po rnams kyang ston/ /thub pa dpa' bo la lar dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul ston/ /gang la pha rol mu stegs tshogs kyi 'gro ba ma mchis shing / /rdul bral mya ngan ma mchis thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid thob pa/ /bla na med pa 'gyur ba ma mchis 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas byang chub brnyes/ /phyogs kyi lam rnams thams cad du yang 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad/ /mi yi dbang po kun nas

zhal ldan chu zla bzhin du bzhugs/ /bde gshegs rang byung mtha' yas yul la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /la la dag la sangs rgyas chos kyi sku ni ston mdzad pa/ /rtag pa brtan pa ther zug 'gyur ba ma mchis gyur pa dang / /ma

bgyis ma skyes dri ma ma mchis 'gog pa ma mchis chos/ /mig yor 'dra bas phyogs bcu dag ni shin du rgyas par 'gengs/ /ring por mi thogs par ni sdug pa dag dang 'bral 'gyur gyis/ /'dus byas 'di la khyed cag yid brtan bya

ba'i mi rigs shes/ /'gro ba thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang / /mi rtag mi brtan skad cig par yang la la dag la ston/ /bde gshegs sku yi phrin las mtha' dang pha rol yod ma mchis/ /gsung dang thugs kyi 'jug

pa'i spyod yul dag kyang dpag mi lang / /nam mkha' lta bur rgya che tshad ma mchis pa ston mdzad de/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul sems can rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags/ /phyogs bcu dag na mchis pa'i sems can ma lus ji snyed pa/ /de dag

shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar shes rab ldan gyur kyang / /rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po'i dngos po'i yul tshad ma mchis pa/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad de dag rnams kyis rig mi nus/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mkha' 'dra pha rol mtha' ma mchis/

de ltar rgyal ba'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ma lus pa/ /'di na rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun dang nyan thos rnams dang ni/ /rkyen gyi rgyal ba 'dus pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags/ /de ltar 'di dag la sogs mtha' yas thabs

dang ldan pa yi/ /'dul ba'i don du sku yi mdzad pa mtha' yas ston par mdzad/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par mtha' yas sku dang ldan gyur pa/ /mgon po rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal rgya

mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu rgal gyur pa/ /nyon mongs thul ba rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso la bstod pa yi/ /bsod nams ci mchis des ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la reg par shog /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbyang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bsnyun gsol lo/ /

nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang bsnyun gsol lo/ /'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag 'jig rten gyi khams nyams dga' ba la bltar stsol cig ces kyang

gsung ngo / /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po des yongs su khyab pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs dag

kyang mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 'dir lhags pa 'di dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'am/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po 'di dag gi mthu yin snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di ltar 'jig rten gyi

khams mi mjed 'di khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par gda' ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to/ /gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba

can nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu lags sam/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi mthu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs

su khyab par snang ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma yin gyi/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyi

mthu yin no/ /gsol pa 'di ltar 'di dag gis mthus 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par gda' ba ni skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam dag dang /

dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ji skad

smras pa de de bzhin te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa yin no/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni sgyu ma

lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa yin te/ 'di gnyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ston to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod shar gyi phyogs cha logs su de na ci snang

ltos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig sgrib pa med pas bltas na shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi zhabs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob gnyis

phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol lo/ /nyam nga ba

nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snyun gsol lo zhes smra'o/ /de bzhin du lho'i phyogs cha dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du 'og dang / de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin

du phyogs bcu kun du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na skyes bu dam pa de gnyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar yang mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de shin du ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par

bsgrubs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing

thams cad na gda' ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas

kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / de bzhin du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des

kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang /

mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor srog chags sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas
ji srid cig lags/ de'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang de'i bya ba dang / de'i spyod pa dang / de'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ de lta bas na pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang

bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying

po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong gi rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de snyed du tshad med pa/ de snyed du bsam gyis mi khyab

pa/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji tsam yod pa de bas kyang ches mang ba'i bskal pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun du ston pa zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

gser 'od seng ge'i rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba

de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de dag dpe cung zad tsam gyis cung zad cig brjod par byas nyon cig /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad ma mchis te/ ngag gi las kyis

lan gdab par sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po las chu thigs pa gcig blangs na

pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu blangs pa dang / lhag ma lus pa de gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das blangs pa ni nyung / lhag ma lus pa ni tshad ma mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod mos

par bya'o/ /khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o/ /mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mo des rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa ji snyed pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po ji snyed pa de tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser

'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun du ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan bkod par blta'o/ /de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dpag

tu med de/ ji ltar da ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med do zhes bya na/ de las brgya stong du bsgres pa bas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ches mang ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang de snyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de ni theg pa gsum kho na

las brtsams te chos ston to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i

rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang / bde ba'i rgyu las brtsams te chos bstan par 'dod kyang / nga'i spobs pa yang zad par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de'i

mthar phyin par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i gsung rab la 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi dbang phyug chos dang ldan

pa chos kyi rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'i rgyal po zhig byung ste/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la bu bye ba phrag brgya yod de/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa

brgyad dang ldan par gyur to/ /de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi yongs su longs spyod pa'i bskyed mos tshal ni bdun khri

drug stong yod do/ /rgyal bu re re la yang longs spyod kyi bskyed mos tshal khri khri yod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na

bud med mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ni med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med ming yang mi grag ste/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang tshangs par spyod pa las gyur pa/ brdzus

te byung ba sha stag go/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na kha zas rags pa med par gyur to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid

de ni las gzhan med de bu de rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das de la lo bye ba stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bsnyen bkur byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas tshad med pa'i

phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen pos spyod pa tshad med pa dag don tu gnyer bar mi bya ba de gang yang med do/ /rdul ba tshad med pa gang dag brtsam par mi bya ba de gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ni tshad med do/ /

tshul khrims ni tshad med/ bzod pa ni tshad med/ brtson 'grus ni tshad med/ bsam gtan ni tshad med/ shes rab ni tshad med/ 'khor ba sangs rgyas su 'dzin pa ni tshad med/ sems can dag la byams pa ni tshad med/

zhing gi bkod pa dag ni tshad med/ nyan thos dag ni tshad med/ gzugs yongs su grub pa dag ni tshad med/ dbyangs ni tshad med/ spobs pa ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na

sems bskyed pa gcig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad tshad med pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/ /ji ltar yongs su bsngos pas tshad med par 'gyur zhe na/ gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la yongs su sngo bar byed pa de'i tshe sems

can 'di dag thams cad skye ba med par mngon sum du byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu yongs su bsngo ba tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /stong pa nyid tshad med pa'o/ /mtshan

ma med pa tshad med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa tshad med pa'o/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa tshad med pa'o/ /de ltar na 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag pa'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings rnam par grol ba/ ma skyes pa/ dben pa/ bral ba/ mya ngan las 'das

pa/ tshad med pa ste/ rigs kyi bu mdor na chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'o/ /de'i phyir chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa zhes bya'o/ /gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de ni tshad med pa'o/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal pos de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /des kyang

chos tshad med pa dag la nges par sems par byas par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis bcom ldan 'das de las chos dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste

dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bu de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ 'dren pa chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba/ /smra ba'i tshogs rnams yang dag rab tu 'joms/ /

bdud kyi rtsod dang nyon mongs kun sel ba/ /mtshungs med ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi zla dag dang me yi 'od rnams dang / /brgya byin tshangs pa nor bu glog 'od rnams/ /bde gshegs gzi brjid kyis ni mog mog gyur/ /mi mchog 'od mdzad

pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa bskal pa rgya mtsho 'das par yang / /dka' ba rnam pa du ma spyod par mdzad/ /phrin las de yi 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba ste/ /des na 'gro bas bltas na ngoms mi 'gyur/ /skye dang rga dang na dang 'chis gtses shing / /

sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir gzigs nas/ /de dag rnams la thub chen thugs rje ste/ /rtag tu mi 'pho zhi ba'i chos kyang ston/ /srid gsum srog chags kun gyi sman pa 'dra/ /'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa thams cad sbyong / /

thugs rje bskyed pa mdzad nas chos kyi sman/ /zhi ba bla na med par rab tu ston/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /rab 'byam zhing rnams kun na srog chags kyi/ /mkhyen nas gang gis mya ngan 'das mchog la/ /reg par 'gyur

ba de 'dra'i chos kyang ston/ /mi mchog khyod kyi thugs rje ci 'dra ba/ /ji snyed rab 'byam zhing gi nyan thos dang / /rkyen byung thub pa ma lus de dag la/ /de 'dra ba yi snying rje yong ma mchis/ /bsod nams phung po mtshan mchog rnams dang ldan/ /

rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /bye ba'i nyi las lhag pa'i gzi mnga' ba/ /mi mchog mtshungs ma mchis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos sprin rgyal las chos char 'bebs pa na/ /gang dag rgya chen mos pa spyod yul ba/ /sngon gyi

sangs rgyas spyod la 'jigs ma mchis/ /de dag rtag tu bde gshegs mdun na mchis/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su/ /mi mchog mthong ba rnyed par shin du dka'/ /bsod nams las kyis bsam pa yongs sbyangs

pa/ /de dag mig lam rnam par 'dren rnams gda'/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni chos dbyings rgyas par 'gengs/ /zhing rnams rab 'byam thams cad na yang gda'/ /bzhud dang byon par mngon pa yod ma mchis/ /'on kyang 'jig

rten dag na snod bzhin gda'/ /bden pa gzigs shing don dam ston pa pa'o/ /chos kyi sbyin bdag zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa/ /rgal nas srog chags bcings gyur gzhan sgrol ba/ /bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod

kyis skye ba'i shing ljon rtsa nas bton/ /nga rgyal ri bo sra ba rdul du brlags/ /rgod pa mi mnga' g.yo dang sgyu dang bral/ /rab zhi thugs dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi mchog chags pa thams cad yong mi mnga'/ /dgongs pa sa

dang chu dang me dang 'dra/ /rgyal ba sems can kun la snyoms thugs ldan/ /rlung dang nam mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa chen po yon tan 'di 'dra'i gter/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho las byung sku dang ldan/ /bskal pa

khrag khrig dag tu de brjod kyang / /yon tan rgya mtsho zad par nus ma lags/ /yon tan rgya mtsho lha mis mchod pa la/ /bdag ni bu dang bcas te mchod pa bgyid/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa/ /des ni thub

pa chen po khyod 'drar shog /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dus gzhan zhig na/ bskyed mos tshal na bsam gtan gyi gnas pas gnas shing 'dug pa'i blo g.yas g.yon nas/ tsan dan

sbrul gyi snying po'i pad ma bkra ba blta na sdug pa dag pa gnyis byung ngo / /pad ma de gnyis las khye'u ming rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba gnyis rdzus te byung nas/ skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug go/ /pad ma'i

dpal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas khye'u gnyis skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /khyed gnyis lha 'am klu yin

nam/ /gnod sbyin dri za mi ci 'am/ /mi 'am mi ma yin nam ci/ /dris pa smros shig grogs po dag /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi g.yas phyogs su byung ba'i khye'u gang yin pa des rgyal po dpal

gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ grogs po chos kun stong pa yi/ /ming ni 'dri bar byed dam ci/ /chos rnams thams cad ming med na/ /gang gi ming ni 'dri bar byed/ /stong nyid gang la'ang lha med cing / /klu med srin po

yong ma yin/ /mi 'am mi ma yin yang rung / /thams cad de na yong med do/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas khye'u gcig shos des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ming ni ming gis stong pa ste/ /ming

la ming ni yod ma yin/ /chos rnams thams cad ming med de/ /'on kyang ming gis yongs su brjod/ /ming gi rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /de ni ma mthong ma thos so/ /las kyis 'gags pa ma yin na/ /'di na gang gi ming zhig

'dri/ /tha snyad du ni ming byas nas/ /ming btags byas te bstan pa ni/ /kho bo'i ming ni rin chen sems/ /gcig shos rin chen mchog ces bya/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u gnyis kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag

smras te mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal

po ga la ba der dong ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u

de gnyis kyis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ pad ma dag dang dri bda' dang / /me tog phreng dang na bza' dang / /'on te zas dang skom gyis sam/ /rgyal ba ji ltar mchod par bgyi/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

rkang gnyis gtso/ /ji ltar mchod par 'gyur ba lags/ /don 'di legs par bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa thos nas 'tshal bar bgyi/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas des khye'u de gnyis la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na/ /mtshan mchog sum bcu gnyis ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dag la mchod par 'gyur/ /

mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas zhing / /gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed dag /me tog rnams kyis bkang byas te/ /'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas/ /gang gis 'dir ni thal sbyar nas/ /byang chub tu ni sems btud na/ /'di ni bsod

nams ches mang ste/ /de la tshad ni yod ma yin/ /byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba/ /de ltar blo mchog gis bstan pa/ /de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang med/ /de 'dra ba yi dpal yang med/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u de gnyis

kyis slar yang bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /bdag cag yi dam yang dag 'chas/ /bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra/ /lha dang mi dag gsan mdzod cig /ji srid du ni 'khor

ba yi/ /sngon gyi mtha' ni mi dmigs pa/ /de srid bskal pa du mar yang / /sems can phyir ni spyad par bgyi/ /ji tsam sngon gyi mtha' dran pa/ /rnam grangs 'di yi tshul dag gis/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /de srid

bskal par spyad par bgyi/ /gal te de ring slan chad du/ /'dod chags kyi ni sems 'byung ba/ /phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bslus par 'gyur/ /de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dang / /phrag dog ser sna'ang

de bzhin no/ /rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smra zhing / /brdzun gyi tshig ni spang bar bgyi/ /gal te de ring slan chad du/ /rdul med byang chub ma thob par/ /bdag cag nyan thos sems gyur pa/ /des ni brdzun du smra bar 'gyur/ /nams kyang rang

sangs rgyas su ni/ /bdag cag dga' bar mi bgyid de/ /sems can rnams la snying rje zhing / /bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi/ /ji ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhing / /grub pa rnam pa 'di dag las/ /gzhan du yon tan bye ba snyed/ /phun sum

tshogs pa'i zhing du bgyi/ /de na nyan thos gang yang med/ /rang rgyal 'dren pa dag kyang med/ /de tshe bye ba tshad med pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gnas/ /bde ba 'di dang ldan pa yi/ /skye bo dri ma med par 'gyur/ /sangs

rgyas mdzod ni bzungs bas na/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams tshar phyin to/ /gal te 'di dag gzhan min par/ /de bzhin du ni 'gyur nges na/ /rgya mtshor bcas dang rir bcas pa'i/ /sa 'di thams cad g.yos par shog /tshig 'di smras

pa'i mod la ni/ /sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /sil snyan dag ni ma dkrol bar/ /de na thams cad sgra yang 'byin/ /stong phrag bye ba'i lha rnams kyis/ /me tog char dang phye ma'i char/ /spos kyi char ni yid 'ong dang / /na bza' bye

ba rab tu phab/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs sam yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog

ces bya ba de gnyis gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de yang de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khye'u rin chen mchog ces bya bar gyur

to/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob 'di ni khye'u rin chen sems shes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa ni de yin no/ /de skad ces bka'

stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ji tsam du zab mo la mos pa gyur pa dang / gang gi

ming yang ma dmigs pa de srid du 'di gnyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das la skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la rim gro bgyis

par gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ni bgrang bas mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni de lta ma yin te/ de srid du 'di gnyis kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos shing yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan te/ 'di gnyis

kyi yon tan dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med

pa bde ba kun du ston pa zhes bgyi ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de 'di nas phyogs gang logs na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs na ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun du ston pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /

de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan

thos phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / tshe ji tsam pa dang / longs spyod ci 'dra ba dang / 'od ci 'dra ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan

ji skad ces bgyi ba de dag legs par bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam chen po bshad pa thos nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang smon

lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po

de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang bcom ldan

'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med de/ de'i mtha' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du bshad kyang rtogs par sla ba ma yin

no/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi tshe dpag tu med tu zin kyang 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ yun du gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'das

pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa

bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i bar du de'i dam pa'i chos gnas te/ ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub ste/ lhag

chad med par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan du na sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ba med par zad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur/ de dag rtag tu

rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'od dpag med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma dag dang shing ljon pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa

de ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du pad ma dag dang shing ljon pa de dag las kyang chos kyi sgo brgya phrag du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i

chos nub ma thag pa'i mtshan mo skya ring 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rin po che du ma'i bkod pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas

'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bstan kyang mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas

kyi zhing de'i bde ba'i rgyu dang yon tan gyi rgyu ni de snyed du 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang rigs kyi bu dpe tsam du cung zad cig bshad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas

kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa yon tan gyi bkod pa snga ma dag ni yon tan bkod pa 'di dag gi brgya'i char yang mi chog /stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi

zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gis gang bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos dang

rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi brgya'i

char yang mi chog ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de'i tshe tshad ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro/ /de'i dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bye ba drug bcu rtsa

gsum du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming yang bde ba

can zhes bgyi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni rin chen kun nas bsags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas

'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i tshe ji srid gnas pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de srid du byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de'i dam

pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos yan ring por gnas par bya ba'i phyir spro bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi ma'i dus su der dam pa'i chos nub nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/

lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan shin du gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa dang / snang ba phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba de ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa yon tan shin du gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ lhag chad med cing shin du lhag pa med par 'gyur ro/ /tshe'i yun dang dam pa'i chos gnas pa yang de srid du 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang

rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin du gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i

rgyal po de'i mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po bud med gang la las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od

seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dang / ma 'ongs pa de gnyis kyi mtshan thos na de bud med kyi rang bzhin las 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcur 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rjes nas kyang rab tu 'byung ba 'thob

par 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi dang skye dgu'i srogs chags bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis mgrin gcig tu

tshig smras pa/ gang dag ma byon pa de dag dang / gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag dang / phyogs bcu na gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gi mtshan

gang lags pa de dag la yang rjes su yi rang ngo / /tshig 'di skad ces kyang smra ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lhan cig tshogs pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes

smras so/ /de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /srog chags khrag khrig brgya phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral

ba rnam par dag go/ /dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyis phyogs bcu na bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa mthong ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/ /mthong nas kyang tshig 'di skad 'dzer to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di gnyis

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis legs par yongs su bzung ba lags te/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed cig lung ston pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub

sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /

kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs

su 'dri ba'i gtam 'dis ci zhig bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can dman pa la mos pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la yid mi ches par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar 'di dag yun ring por gnod pa dang /

phan pa med pa dang / bde ba med pa dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag rgya chen po la mos pa dang / mos pa mang ba dag kyang mchis/ slad ma'i

skye bo rnams la yang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur na de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i phyir

legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di la mi gang la la stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ ji tsam sems can gyi khams su gdags pas btags pa'i sems can gyi khams de ni

de bzhin gshegs pas ches mang bar gsungs kyi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin te/ sems can de dag thams cad bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas mu med par mgo bo 'am/ phrag pa 'am/ lag pa na thogs te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar

du de dag la gos dang zas dag byin te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byed/ bla mar byed na pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po mi de gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ sems can
gcig la yang se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig byams pa'i sems kyis khyab par bgyis na de tsam gyis kyang bsod nams mang du bskyed na/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas mu ma mchis par sems can thams cad bzung

ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro bgyis pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs

pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di byang chub kyi sems la gnas te/ len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa

la zhugs pa/ mos pa mang ba dag gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du skyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bdag gis blang bar bgyi/ bzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/

gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos tshig de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis dbyangs

gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di blang bar bgyi/ bzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ gzhan dag la yang rgya

cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

bud med kyis thos ma thag tu bud med kyi dngos po las 'gyur te/ rgyu gnyis ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ phrag dog dang / ser sna'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / rgyal po

chen po bzhi dang / lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag gis lha'i me tog mAn dA ra ba dag bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la mngon par gtor to/ /lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig

brgya stong gsil nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang 'dzer to/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa dag legs par bton nas 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i

sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa dang /

gang dag thos nas mos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ de nas sring mo rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba/ 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa de/ stan las langs nas

lhag pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas phrag dog dang / ser sna spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni mad pa gsung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhing bud med gzhan gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na thos pa'i mod la bud med kyi dngos

po las 'gyur ba lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ phung po 'di nyid la bud med kyi dbang po mi gda' bar 'gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur cig ces smras so/ /de nas sring mo de de nyid du bud med kyi dbang po mi snang bar

gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur to/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas nyon mongs pa thams cad zlog pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po
dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
bstod do/ /'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs so// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // dge'o// yang zhus kun skar mas zhus so//

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na mu drA sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na/ dge slong stong

nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sum bcu thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul pa/ smon lam bcos ma ma yin pa/ smon pa med pa la gnas pa/ spyod lam bcos pa med pa/ sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa/ mnyam pa nyid du bzod pa

thob pa/ mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i gzungs thob pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam pa dang / spyod pa'i tshul shin du shes pa sha stag dang thabs
gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ gzung ba med pa/
thogs pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ rtsa ba med pa/ rten pa med pa/ dmigs su med pa/ mi

mnyam pa dang mnyam pa med pa/ zla med pa/ nga yi ba med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ mi bya ba ma byas pa/ ma song ba/ ma 'ongs pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ mi gnas pa/ rgyun chad pa med pa/ gnas med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma

thams cad dang bral ba/ blang ba med pa/ dor ba med pa/ 'dus ma byas pa/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa/ 'du ba med pa/ bral ba med pa/ sems med pa/ sems dang bral ba/ kun du 'byung ba med pa/ rtsom pa med pa/ yongs

su grub pa med pa/ ma byung ba/ kun du ma byung ba/ rab tu rgyu ba med pa/ yang dag par rgyu ba med pa/ shin du stong pa/ 'dre ba med pa/ chos thams cad la sgro btags pa med pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku yang mi snang

sku'i mtshan ma yang mi snang / sems dang sems kyi mtshan ma yang mi snang / na bza' dang na bza'i mtshan ma yang mi snang / gdan dang gdan gyi mtshan ma yang mi snang / gzims pa dang gzims pa'i mtshan ma

yang mi snang / 'chag pa dang 'chag pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang / bzhings pa dang bzhings pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang / gnas pa dang gnas pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang / grib ma'i dbyibs dang grib ma'i dbyibs

kyi mtshan ma yang mi snang / bzhugs pa dang bzhugs pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang zhing sgra dang sgra'i mtshan ma yang mi grag go/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis stong gsum gyi

stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ 'di lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang / nyi ma

dang / skar ma dang / me dang / nor bu dang / glog gi 'od rnams kyang mi snang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / skar ma rnams dang / lha'i gzhal med khang

gi 'od kyang mi snang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus gang lha kha cig kyang lha'i dri mi tshor te

stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad lha'i dri las shin du 'das pa'i dris dri rab tu zhim par byas so/ /'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang snang bar gyur/ khor yug gi ri dang khor

yug gi ri chen po yang snang bar byas/ ri rab dang / de ma yin pa ri'i rgyal po gzhan dag dang / ri nag po dag kyang snang bar gyur te/ phyis ni sems can gang gi mig gi dbang po la yang snang bar ma gyur to/ /

stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rin po che'i dra bas kun nas bskor bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad du yang dar gyi lda ldi bres shing pog snod nas spos kyis bdugs la me tog

sna tshogs bkram par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas kyang bya rgod phung po'i ri dang bcas te/ de dag thams cad lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing / shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyi rin po che sna

tshogs kyi pad ma chen po 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa/ dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong bas kun gang bar gyur to/ /steng gi bar snang las kyang rin po che'i dra ba'i gdugs kyis g.yogs shing brgyan to/ /yul ma ga d+hA thams cad kyang gos

ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis

thogs pa tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa brgya stong rnams kyang so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bskul te/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du deng shig /de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag

rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin de thos pa tsam gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gces spras byed par 'gyur te/ thabs mkhas pa med par bskal pa brgya stong du

pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad pa ni de lta ma yin gyis ting nge 'dzin de nyan du deng shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag

'tshal te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas mi snang bar gyur nas rang rang gi mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ga la ba dang / dbus kyi gling bzhi

pa ga la ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling ga la ba dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
